She runs a buy and sell charcoal in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Jenelyn has been in this business for 10 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Sheila May

texts.en:
Sheila May is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She has a frozen food retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stock of frozen food to resell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Sheila May dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school

loans.use: to buy additional stock of frozen food to resell.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny works hard to support her family. Jenny is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like coffee, milk, can goods, soap, shampoo, etc.

Jenny has been in this business for 9 years now.

In the future, Jenny would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like coffee, milk, can goods, soap, shampoo, etc

loans.name: Sreynet's Group

texts.en:
Sreynet, a farmer living in Kampong Cham province, is 18 years old and she has a young child.  She earns income to support her family’via cassava and rubber growing.  Her daily income is about 48,000KHR per day, but she is able to save around 12,000KHR each day after offsetting her family expenses. Low cassava yields are still the main challenge for her business. 

She is just with VisionFund for this cycle. In a group of two, Sreynet who is the leader will take her entire first loan portion to buy bowls for extracting rubber latex and use some portion of it to spend on fertilizer for her cassava. 

She hopes to quickly grow her cassava and rubber so as to get more yields in order to sell it for a good price and have enough ability to expand her farmland.

loans.use: to spend on fertilizer for her cassava

loans.name: Sitha's Group

texts.en:
Sitha is a 33-year-old mother of three children and two of them are in school while the other one is too young to attend school. 

She is a cassava farmer and grocery seller, living Kratie province and to earn additional income to be better support her family, she works on another farm for wages as well. She has been involved in these businesses for fifteen years and it earns her about 30,600KHR per day and saves around 15,000KHR for emergency needs. 

Sitha has been a client of VisionFund for four cycles already and has fully paid back the loans. The past loans helped her to have better living conditions, but last year, the price of cassava has depreciated and it affected to her daily income. Now she is lacking of fund to do farming for this year, so she decided to lead a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund. 

As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy seeds, fertilizer and to pay for plowing. She hopes to earn more money and extend her farming business through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing

loans.name: Vannak's Group

texts.en:
Vannak is 37-year-old, living in a rural area of the Banteay Meanchey province’s Mongkul Borey district and she is a mother of five children. Nowadays, she earns income to support her family’s condition via rice farming and working for others for a fee. Having been in this business for seventeen years, she can make an income around 30,000KHR per day and she is able to save about 18,000KHR each day after offsetting her daily expenses. Her crops have been destroyed by insect pests is the main challenge for her farming business.

This is her third loan cycle for her with VisionFund. She is now applying for a new loan of 2,000,000KHR while another member is seeking for a loan of 200,000KHR. As the group leader, Vannak is going to use entire loan portion to spend on buying fertilizer, seed and pesticide for the rice fields. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more rice crop yields so as to upgrade her living’s condition.

loans.use: to spend on buying fertilizer, seed and pesticide for the rice fields

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es:
José es un joven honesto, esforzado y trabajador de veintiocho años de edad. Él estudia la carrera de contabilidad pública y finanzas, está en su último año de la carrera, su principal apoyo es su esposa quien además es la madre de su hijo, un pequeño de tres años de edad. Él estudia los días domingo, dado que de lunes a sábado trabaja como asistente administrativo en una compañía que distribuye gasolina en su ciudad. 
En estos momentos, José está a un paso de egresar de la universidad, por eso solicita un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCredito para poder cancelar los aranceles de sus módulos y así poder recibir su título para luego buscar mejores oportunidades laborales. En un futuro desea estudiar otra carrera y luego sacar una maestría.
texts.en:
Jose is an honest, determined, and hard-working young man. He is 28 years old, and he is studying public accounting and finance. He is in his last year of school, and his main supporter is his wife. She is also the mother of his child, a 3-year-old boy. He studies on Sundays, since he works Monday through Saturday as an administrative assistant for a company that distributes gas in the city where he lives.

Currently, Jose is on the verge of graduating from his university. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Kiva together with MiCredito to cover the costs of his degree requirements so that he can receive his degree and subsequently look for better job opportunities. In the future, he wishes to study another career and to get a master's degree.

loans.use: to cover the costs of his degree requirements.

loans.name: Ayaba

texts.fr: Ayaba est une femme mariée âgée de 36 ans et habite dans le quartier de Baguida. Ayaba travaille courageusement pour assurer les charges quotidiennes de ses trois enfants. Pour répondre aux besoins, Ayaba vend des denrées d’alimentations générales et s’approvisionne huit fois par mois pour avoir le revenu nécessaire. Ayaba désire ce crédit pour commander du sac de riz, un carton de spaghettis et un bidon d’huile qui lui permettront de maximiser son profit et soutenir l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Ayaba is a married woman, 36 years old, living in the Baguida district. She works bravely to ensure her children’s day-to-day expenses are covered. To respond to the need, she sells grocery items and gets her supplies eight time a month to have the necessary revenues. Ayaba would like this loan to order rice, spaghetti, and oil that will enable her to maximize her profit and support her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of rice, a box of spaghetti, and a container of oil

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en:
A $800.00 is offered to Filomena to improve her business. Filomena lives in Oecusse and she is a business woman. And most of her daily income is from her store so she still happy to do her business. She opened her business in 2010, with her own working capital of $100.00 . She is going to add money from Tuba Rai Metin with her principal amount to buy more additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as salt, biscuits, flour, aqua, tea, sugar, noodles, slippers, soft drinks and other things to sell. 

It has become her activity so she is happy to do her business every day. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. And she will have management for her business with this loan.

loans.use: To buy salt, biscuits, flour, aqua, tea, sugar, noodles, slippers, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Ayoko

texts.fr: Célibataire et âgée de 22 ans, Ayoko est une femme qui habite à Baguida. Ayoko vend des produits de beauté et des pommades en parcourant le quartier afin de gagner son revenu quotidien. Pour arriver à ses fins, Ayoko s’approvisionne trois fois par mois. Pour commander des pommades et des parfums, Ayoko demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’un revenu afin de subvenir favorablement à ses besoins.
texts.en: Unmarried and 22 years old, Ayoko is a woman who lives in Baguida. She sells beauty products and ointments by going throughout her district, so as to earn her livelihood. To reach her goals, she gets her supplies three times a month. For an order of ointments and perfumes, Ayoko is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to have an income in order to support herself.

loans.use: to purchase a box of ointment and a dozen of perfumes

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 62 years old now.

Monina has a business making stuffed toys in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials such as cotton, thread and fabrics for her business.

Monina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cotton, thread and fabrics for her business.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 38 years old, married and a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a buy-and-sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of nipa roofing to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like a furniture shop, buying and selling bamboo and raising pigs

Maribel dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of nipa roofing to sell.

loans.name: Jonna

texts.en:
Jonna is 41 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of household goods like soap, shampoo, coffee, sugar, etc.

Jonna has been in this business for 9 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of household goods like soap, shampoo, coffee, sugar, etc

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 48 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines and also earning an income from buying and selling vegetables, dried fish and charcoal.

Nenita has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store, like canned goods, personal care products, etc. She has borrowed and repaid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Nenita has been running the general store for 10 years. She aspires to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 36 years old, married and has eight children.

She is in the agricultural business pig fattening in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jocelyn has been pig fattening for 5 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Mevilyn

texts.en:
Mevilyn is 46 years old and married with six children. She lives in a rural community near Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She owns and operates a small general shop, selling items such as rice, noodles, biscuits and canned food. She has been doing this for two years.

Mevilyn requested a loan to buy a new refrigerator and new stock of goods for her business. She hopes to cover her family's weekly expenses and also improve the standard of living for her family with the profits she makes with her business.

She has been a SPBD member since 2014 to gain access to financial services

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, biscuits, noodles, canned food and a refrigerator for her general shop.

loans.name: Rhea

texts.en:
Rhea is a 25-year-old married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who has a processed food business in the Philippines.

Rhea has requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy eggs for her processed food business. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested this new loan to further build her business.

Rhea has been in this business for two years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy eggs for her processed food business

loans.name: Thavy's Group

texts.en:
A 53-year-old widowed mother of five (two of whom are still dependent), Thavy is a rural villager, living in Kratie province. 

Nowadays, she grows cassava and works on another farm for wages and has been doing this for twelve years.  It earns her around 31,900KHR per day. 

Thavy's cassava crop did not fare well and it affected to her daily income over the past year. Now, she doesn't have enough funds to restart growing cassava for this season. Therefore, Thavy has taken a new loan via VisionFund to buy fertilizer to support her farming. This is the second Kiva loan via VisionFund for her group of four. 

She hopes this loan will help her to gain more yields than previous year.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her farming.

loans.name: Rowina

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Rowina works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell firewood business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Rowina is borrowing 22,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more stocks of firewood to sell to her customers for her buy-and-sell firewood business.

Rowina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of firewood to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Delilah

texts.en:
Delilah is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 43 years old and has two children who are in school.

Delilah has a soft drink retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional stock of soft drinks and beverages to sell.

Delilah has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of soft drinks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Marcelina requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Marcelina has been in this business for three years now.

Marcelina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios works hard to support her family. Remedios is married and has a buy-and-sell used clothing business in the Philippines.

She requested a 23,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell. Remedios has been in this business for 20 years now.

Remedios would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 50 years old and has seven children. She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Rosa is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs. Rosa has been in this business for 4 years now, and has borrowed from NWTF 2 times in the past to sustain it.

Rosa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is married and works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bundle of fishing net.

Lilia has been in this business for two years now. In the future, she would like to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bundle of fishing net

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es:
Rafael a sus 60 años es un hombre muy activo, trabajador y responsable. Se caracteriza por ser fiel a su palabra y por ofrecer una sonrisa en los momentos más difíciles.  Tiene 17 años de dedicarse a la vulcanización y gracias  a este negocio ha podido sacar adelante a su familia. 

Sin embargo, solicita un crédito para comprar neumáticos, llantas, aceites, grasas y piezas para motores. Esto le será de ayuda porque podrá contar con todo el material necesario que necesita para ofrecer un trabajo de calidad. En consiguiente, incrementará sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Rafael, at 60 years of age, is a very active, hardworking, and responsible man. He can be described as being true to his word and for coming up with a smile at the most difficult times. He has been working in tire repair for 17 years, and thanks to this business, he has been able to get his family ahead.

Nevertheless, he is applying for a loan to buy tires, tubes, oil, grease, and engine parts. This will help him because he will have all the materials he needs to do a good job. As a result, his income will increase.

loans.use: to buy tires, tubes, oil, grease, and engine parts.

loans.name: Phanna

texts.en:
Phanna, 53, lives in the community of Kandal Province, Cambodia. She is the mother of four children. To make a living and support her family, she raises ducks and grows vegetables to sell. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 9.00 a day. So far, she has been in this type of business for ten years.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Eufemia is 61 years old and has one child who is in school.

Eufemia has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 11,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Eufemia has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marivic is 37 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Marivic has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. Marivic requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her weaving business.

Marivic has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Sanh

texts.en: Sanh is a 32-year-old mother of two children, one of whom is still small while the other is in school. She lives in Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district. The sources of her family’s living income have been from cassava growing and rice farming for twelve years. Her business earns her approximately 22,000 KHR per day for supporting her family. Low cassava crops is the main challenge. She has been with VisionFund for two cycles. The past loans have helped her better support her family. Now she is applying for a loan to buy pesticide, fertilizer and pay the labor fee. She hopes to get more yields in order to sell them for a good price so as to buy more plots of farmland.

loans.use: to buy pesticide, fertilizer and pay the labor fee.

loans.name: Rubyrose

texts.en:
Rubyrose is 27 years old and single with three children, two of whom are still in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Rubyrose runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell like milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, bread and other personal care collections.

Rubyrose has been in this business for three years.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, bread and other personal care collections.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 63 years old, married with ten children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Gloria has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her general store.

Gloria has been in this business for thirty years. In the future, Gloria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Eveling

texts.es:
Eveling  es propietaria de un molino,  inició su negocio con mucho sacrificio junto a su esposo, para así generar una fuente extra de ingresos. Al principio las ganancias eran pocas pero con el tiempo fue ganando clientes y se convirtió en un local próspero y rentable. 

Ella es una mujer proactiva y emprendedora, pues también vende cosméticos. Por ello, solicita un crédito para darle mantenimiento a su molino y  comprar cosméticos. Esto le será de ayuda porque podrá optimizar su máquina de trabajo y venderá más productos de maquillaje; en consiguiente, aumentarán sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Eveling is the owner of a mill. She started her business with her husband through a lot of sacrifice in order to generate an extra source of income. At first, the earnings were small, but with time, she acquired customers and it became a thriving and profitable shop.

She is a proactive and enterprising woman who also sells cosmetics. That is why she is applying for a loan to perform maintenance on her mill and to buy cosmetics. This will help her because she will be able to make the most of the machine she uses for her work, and she will sell more makeup products. As a result, she will increase her earnings.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her mill and to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Ilse Manuela

texts.es:
Ilse es una mujer  de 23 años de edad, es soltera  tiene una linda hija de un año, ella vive junto a su hija en una comunidad de Nahualá.
Ilse para darle lo mejor a su pequeña hija se dedica a la compra y venta de útiles escolares, esta labor lo realiza ella desde hace un año, este negocio lo eligió ella porque en su comunidad no cuentan con una librería que pudiera facilitar a los estudiantes sus útiles necesarios.
Ilse con el afán de brindarle a su pequeña una mejor calidad de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar   un préstamo y realizar la remodelación de su casa lo más necesario que se deberá cambiar es el techo y repellar las paredes, por lo que se deberá comprar laminas, arena y cal.
El gran sueño de Ilse es que su librería sea más grande e instalar un centro de internet para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
IIlse is a 23 year old woman. She is single and has a lovely 1 year old daughter. She and her daughter live together in the community of Nahualá.

In order to provide the best for her young daughter she buys and sells school supplies. She has been doing this work for a year. She chose this business because there isn’t a bookstore in her community where students could obtain their school supplies.

Ilse in an eager attempt to provide her little one a better quality of life has made the decision of asking for a loan in order to remodel her house. What’s most needed is to change the roof and plaster the walls, so she should buy corrugated sheets, sand, and lime.

Ilse’s great dream is that her bookstore expands and to install an internet center to improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy corrugated sheets, sand, and lime to repair her roof and walls.

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Sophal, 50, lives in a community of Kompong Speu Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of six children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small rice farmland which is located near her house. So far, she has been in his types of business for around thirty years. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 2.00 a day.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine for the health and well being of her family

loans.name: Ma. Linda

texts.en:
Ma. Linda is 48 years old, married with nine children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of household good to sell like soap, shampoo, egg, noodles, coffee, etc.

Ma. Linda has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from fishing and buy and sell rice.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of household good to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, noodles, coffee, etc

loans.name: Rhea Mae

texts.en:
Rhea Mae is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rhea Mae is 24 years old and has two children who are in school.

Rhea Mae has a basket weaving business in the Philippines. Rhea Mae requested a PHP 12000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more materials for her business.

Rhea Mae has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Rhea Mae would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her basket weaving business

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 44 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Rosemarie works very hard to provide for them.

Rosemarie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like canned goods, detergent soap, noodles, candies, biscuits, etc. to sell.

Rosemarie has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, detergent soap, noodles, candies, biscuits, etc. 

Rosemarie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items like canned goods, detergent soap, noodles, candies, biscuits, etc. to sell

loans.name: Noong Luong 27 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tien, 34, is a Thai ethnic lady who is married and the mother of two: a girl aged 6 and a boy aged 12. She lives with her husband and her two children in a small house and they rely on agriculture production for a living, with plenty of activities such as cultivating rice, breeding cows, pigs, chickens and ducks. 

The income gaining from cultivation and animal husbandry is unstable, which motivates her to continuously expand production. She has recently requested a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program to buy piglets to develop pig farming. Despite lots of difficulties in life, she believes that she will overcome to bring good life for her children. 

Mrs. Tien dreams that her family will have a more abundant life with a new house and her children will acquire success in their bright future. In the picture, she stands at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy piglets to develop a pig farming business to bring more income

loans.name: Selfiana

texts.en:
Selfiana is a business women and she sells donuts and other cakes.  She is requesting a loan of $800.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. And she will used this loan to buy more materials like cooking oil, wheat, bananas and otther materials to making more cake, after she making cake, she will bring to the market for sell. 

She started to selling to doing her business since in 2010 with her own working capital of $100.00. Everyday her life is selling donuts and other cakes, so now she is take this loan from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to make progress in her efforts.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, wheat, bananas and otther materials.

loans.name: Saroth's Group

texts.en:
Saroth is 25 years old and lives in a rural area of the Banteay Meanchey province. Nowadays she does rice farming as her main income and she has also works for others for a fee, and has done so for five years, to earn extra income to support her family. She could earn about 43,000 KHR a day from her business and save around 26,000 KHR each day after deducting her expenses.

Her crops having been destroyed by insect pests is the main challenge for her farming business. She leads a group of two members. She is now seeking for her third loan portion to buy seed, fertilizer and pesticide for her farm. She hopes to earn more income from her current business in order to start up a new business.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and pesticide for her farm

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Yat

texts.en:
Yat, 53, resides in Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. She has five children: three are single and live with her, while the other two are married. To make a living, she manages and operates a farming business in a small rice farmland, which is located in her community. So far, she has been in this type of business for around thirty years. On average, she is able to make an earning of USD 3 per day. 

Yat would like to request a Kiva loan via HKL to buy a motorbike. This loan will allow her to buy a personal vehicle so that she can travel conveniently. She would like to thank all lenders for the financial support and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred is a hard-working woman entrepreneur with three children.  She has a food vending in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Mildred dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Josephine is 47 years old and has three children who are in school.

Josephine has a upholstery business in the Philippines. Josephine requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy raw materials for her upholstery business.

Josephine has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her upholstery business.

loans.name: Aiza

texts.en:
Aiza is 25 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Aiza has a fishing business in the Philippines. Aiza requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional nets for her business.

Aiza has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Aiza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional nets for her fishing business

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es: Jose Manuel, tiene la edad  de 32 años, está en unión libre, vive con su esposa y su hijo,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones de materia orgánica del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y durante el desarrollo y cosecha, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel is 32 years old and lives in a common law marriage. He lives with his wife and son and they are his top priority. With his loan he intends to buy: good quality bean seed, to ensure good germination; organic fertilizers, which will help to improve the condition of the soil organic matter; and other products to use during sowing, development and harvest. It will also pay for hired labour to prepare the ground, work to ensure that rainwater doesn't cause erosion damage, and work to apply the above products and assist with the developing plantation. In this way he can ensure that he does a good job.

He intends to take advantage of the good climatic and soil conditions for this crop in the area, and also put into practice his years of experience in managing bulk grains. He will be able to buy the best quality products as well, so that his plantation develops, is healthy and has a good harvest. As a result, he will have high production in the short term. He wants to use the income, from the harvest he hopes to obtain, for his family's wellbeing and studies, achieve some family goals and continue investing more in his crops. 

It is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hadn't had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has provided him with a loan with greater credit terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy bean seed and organic fertilizers and pay for hired labour for his bean crops

loans.name: Segundo Felix

texts.es:
Segundo Felix tiene 52 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge en el caserío Huancas del distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la Sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Segundo Felix se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde hace más de 5 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Segundo Felix espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo Felix is 52 years old, in a common law relationship, and lives with his wife in the village of Huancas in the district of Querocotillo which is in the province of Cutervo, in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in the community is tranquil. The inhabitants work mainly in trade and raising small livestock.

Segundo Felix works in the transport of passengers in his vehicle (motorcycle taxi). He has been doing this work for more than 5 years and has very good personal and work references in the area.

The loan will be used for repairs and maintenance to his vehicle since currently it is in poor condition. Segundo Felix hopes that with this he can offer a better service to his customers so he can generate more income and thus improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to make repairs and do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marilyn is 37 years old and has four children who are currently in school.

Marilyn has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. Marilyn requested a PHP 22000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional fishing materials and gears for her business.

Marilyn has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing materials and gears for her business

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 66 years old, married with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Lydia has a herbal product retail business in the Philippines. Lydia requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of herbal products to sell.

Lydia has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, Lydia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of herbal products to sell.

loans.name: Ileana De Los Angeles

texts.es: Ileana de Los Angeles, tiene la edad  de 24 años, está casada, vive con su esposo y su hijo, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno a sembrar y para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ileana de Los Angeles is 24 years old, married, and lives with her husband and her son, who are her greatest priority. With the loan she plans to buy bean seeds of good quality that will have good germination, and fertilizer and other products to apply to the crop. She will also pay for the labor costs for the preparation of the land for planting, product application, and assistance on the farm once it has good development. In this way she will ensure the job is done well.

She hopes to take advantage of the zone’s good conditions for this crop, and also to put into practice her several years of experience in managing grains and to purchase better products of higher quality so that the farm will have good development and health, as well as a sufficient harvest and an important production in the short run.

She wants to use the income that she hopes to obtain from the harvest for the wellbeing and education of her family, to accomplish some family goals, and to continue investing in farming. This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans with state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given her this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer fuerte, emprendedora, perseverante y responsable. Tiene muchos años dedicarse a la venta de raspados y aunque es un trabajo cansado le ha permitido mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Ella se siente agradecida porque gracias a los financiamientos de MiCrédito ha podido invertir en su negocio.  

Por ello, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar de azúcar, fruta, hielo, vasos y cucharas. Esto le será de gran ayuda porque podrá tener todos los insumos necesarios para comercializar sus raspados, en consiguiente, aumentara sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa is a strong, enterprising, persistent, and responsible woman. She has worked for many years selling shaved-ice drinks, and although it is tiring work, it has allowed her to improve her family’s quality of life. She feels grateful because thanks to the financing from MiCrédito, she has been able to invest in her business.

That is why she requests a new loan to buy sugar, fruit, ice, cups, and spoons. This will be of great help to her because she will be able to have all the necessary supplies to sell her shaved-ice drinks, and therefore increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy sugar, fruit, ice, cups, and spoons.

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es: Luis Angel, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis Angel is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents and siblings, who are his top priority. With the loan he plans to purchase bean seeds that will have good germination, and organic fertilizer and other products that will improve the ground, as well as other products to apply to his cultivated land. In addition, he will pay labor costs for the preparation of the land, some conservation work for rainwater erosion, product application, and assistance on the farm once it has good development. In this way he will ensure the job is done well.

He hopes to take advantage of the zone’s good conditions for this crop, and also to put into practice his several years of experience in managing grains and to purchase better products of higher quality so that the farm will have good development and health, as well as a sufficient harvest and an important production in the short run.

He wants to use the income that he hopes to obtain from the harvest for the wellbeing and education of his family, to accomplish some family goals, and to continue investing in farming. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any other loans with state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans.

loans.name: Rosa Lissette

texts.es:
Rosa, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja vendiendo pan por las mañanas y en la agricultura por la tarde, tiene un hijo que vive con ella y que aún no estudia. 

Rosa, trabaja en la agricultura, lo ha hecho durante dos años y lo aprendio de unos familiares de ella; decidio hacerlo para tener granos basicos para la alimentacion de su familia; pero además de eso, tambien se dedica a vender pan por las mañanas junto a su pareja, la distancia donde trabaja en la agricultura está a 2 cuadras de su casa.

Rosa, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agricolas como abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para prepara sus cultivos y obtener una buena cosecha. 

Sus sueños son, seguir trabajando muy fuerte para poder darle un mejor futuro a su familia y para que su hijo tenga lo necesario; tambien sueña con tener un medio de transporte para vender el pan, porque eso le permitira visitar mayor numero de clientes.
texts.en:
Rosa studied through ninth grade. She is in a relationship, and her partner works selling bread in the mornings and in agriculture in the afternoons. She has a son who lives with her and who is not yet in school. Rosa makes a living in agriculture. She has been performing this work, which she learned from some of her family members, for the past 2 years. She decided to do this in order to have basic grains to feed her family. In addition to this work, she sells bread in the mornings with her partner. The place where she performs her agricultural labor is 2 blocks away from her house.

Rosa needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides in order to prepare her crops and obtain a good yield. Her dream is to continue working very hard in order to give her family a better future and so that her son can have what he needs. She also dreams of having transportation for her bread sales because that would allow her to visit a greater number of customers.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides in order to prepare her crops and obtain a good yield.

loans.name: Evelia Veronica

texts.es:
Evelia es una mujer de treinta y siete años de edad, llena de energía y ganas de trabajar, la cual posee un negocio de venta de comida rápida y comida tradicional nicaragüense, ella es una mujer que ha formado su negocio y poco a poco ha logrado abastecerse de los utensilios que necesita para preparar sus platillos.
En estos momentos, Evelia necesita surtirse de materia prima y comprar harina, aceite, arroz, frijoles, verduras, carnes, entre otras cosas, para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes, es por eso que está solicitando un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito. Su próximo objetivo es comprar una  freidora y en un futuro se ve con un local con mejor infraestructura que le dé la capacidad de convertir su negocio en restaurante.
texts.en:
Evelia is a 37-year-old woman, full of energy and the desire to work, who has a business selling fast food and traditional Nicaraguan food.  She is a woman who has formed her business, and little by little, she has been able to supply it with the utensils she needs to prepare her dishes.

Currently, Evelia needs to stock up on raw material, and to buy flour, oil, rice, beans, vegetables, and meat, among other things, in order to fulfill the demand from her customers.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito.  Her next objective is to buy a deep-fryer.  In the future, she pictures herself with a venue, with better infrastructure that will give her the capacity to convert her business into a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, rice, beans, vegetables, and meat, among other things.

loans.name: Timoteo De Jesus

texts.es:
Timoteo, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en los oficios domesticos, tiene un hijo que vive en casa y está estudiando. 

Timoteo, trabaja en la agricultura desde hace más de 10 años y lo aprendio de sus padres; decidio hacerlo para poder tener granos basicos para el consumo en su hogar, tambien cultivan hortalizas para vender, esto le permite obtener ingresos para el sustento de su familia, antes solo era empleado joranl. 

Timoteo, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agricolas como abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para sus cultivos, esto le ayudará mucho porque podra ocupar los insumos en el momento adecuado. 

Sus sueños son, poder trabajar lo mejor que pueda para darle un mejor futuro a su familia y que su hijo estudie se prepare academicamente y logre lo que él no pudo.
texts.en:
Timoteo studied until fifth grade.  He is married and his wife works completing household tasks.  He has a son who lives at home and is in school.  

Timoteo has worked in agriculture for over 10 years and learned from his parents.  He decided on this in order to have the basic necessities for his family, since before he was only a day laborer.  

Timoteo needs this loan to purchase agricultural supplies like compost, pesticides and herbicides for his crops.  This will help him a lot because he'll be able to have the supplies at the right time.  His dreams are to work the best he can to give his family a better future and for his son to study and prepare himself academically so he can achieve what Timoteo couldn't.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies like compost, pesticides and herbicides for his crops.

loans.name: Blanca Edis

texts.es:
Blanca, estudio hasta segundo grado, es madre soltera y toda la vida ha trabajado para sacar adelante a su hija, no tiene pareja, pero ahora su hija ya está casada y tiene su propio hogar. 

Blanca, trabaja con ganado de repasto, lo ha hecho por más de dos años y lo aprendio de un cuñado y de sus vecinos, que la motivaron para que trabajara y decidio hacerlo para obtener ingresos para su alimentacion y para ayudar un poco a su hija; además de ese trabaja tambien cuida niños y recibe un salario por eso, antes trabajaba como empleada domestica. 

Blanca, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de respasto, para cuidarlos engordarlos y luego venderlos a un mejor precio.

Sus sueños son, seguir trabajando y viajar a E.E.U.U. aunque sea por poco tiempo, para visitar a una hermana ya que tiene tres años de no verla.
texts.en:
Blanca studied through the second grade. She is a single mother and worked all her life to raise her daughter. She does not have a partner, and now her daughter is married and has her own home.

Blanca works with grazing cattle. She has been doing this for more than two years, learning from her brother-in-law and from neighbors. She decided to do it with the motivation of earning income for food and to help her daughter a little bit. Besides this work she also cares for children and receives a salary for it. She used to work as a domestic employee. 

Blanca needs the loan to buy cattle, to care for and fatten and later sell for a good price.

Her dreams are to continue working and to travel to the United States, however briefly, in order to visit a sister she has not seen for three years.

loans.use: to buy cattle to fatten and later sell for a good price

loans.name: Alberta

texts.en:
Alberta is a 55-year-old married woman with nine children, two attend school. Alberta works very hard to provide for them.

Alberta has run a general store for 10 years and requests 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, shampoo, coffee, and noodles. 

In the future, Alberta would like to save enough money  to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase groceries.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is a 59-year-old married woman with two children.

She has raised pigs for 20 years and requests 16,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase piglets, feed, and other supplies for her business.

She earns additional income operating a general store.

She  works tirelessly to attain her dream which is to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed, and supplies for her business.

loans.name: Diomema

texts.en:
Diomema is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children. She earns a living with an aquaculture business, farming oysters in the Philippines. She supplements this income with earnings from her pig fattening.

Diomema is now borrowing 20,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy materials needed for her oyster farm. Diomema dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her oyster farm.

loans.name: Patria

texts.en:
Patria is 72 years old and married with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Patria has a pottery business in the Philippines. Patria requested a 15,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

Patria has been in this business for 40 years. In the future, Patria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 41 years old and has three children, who are in school. She is married. 

Nenita is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Nenita requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Nenita has been raising pigs for four years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Nenita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is a 55-year-old married woman with nine children, three attend school.

Felomina has raised pigs for 2 years and requests 7,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies.

She has previously borrowed 5 times from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Felomina would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies.

loans.name: Silvestra

texts.en:
Silvestra is a 61-year-old widowed woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Silvestra has a manicure and pedicure business in the Philippines. Silvestra requested a PHP 6000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items such as nail polish to sell.

Silvestra has been in this business for 41 years. In the future, Silvestra would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy nail polish to sell.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is a 59-year-old married with five children.  

She has raised pigs for 6 years and requests 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies.

She has previously borrowed 8 times from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Juanita would like to save money and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies.

loans.name: Dilbarjon

texts.en:
Dilbarjon is an active girl. She was born in northern part of Tajikistan in 1994. She had a childhood dream to get a higher education. She studied at school with excellent marks.

Her father died when she was small child, and her mother raised her alone. Recently, she became a student in university. She is interested in economics and finance. She wants to be a specialist on finance and find a good work in this sphere.

Dilbarjon is asking financial support from KIVA lenders to pay her tuition fee. She is hoping to be supported and wishes her mother will proud of her.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee.

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak is a 32-year-old married woman, with 2 children, from Kampong Cham Province. 

She has managed and operated a farm to grow rice  to sell to the local dealers for sixteen years. She  earns  2.50 USD per day.
  
Parts of her house have deteriorated and need to be fixed to provide a suitable living space for the household. Due to lack of funds, she has applied for a KIVA loan via HKL to pay for  renovations. 

She and her family thank the lenders for helping them with the loan to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en:
Maricar is a 26-year-old married woman with two children.

Maricar works hard to provide for her family and has raised pigs for 5 years.  She requests 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies.

Maricar has previously borrowed 4 times from NWTF. She earns additional income operating a general store.

Maricar aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies.

loans.name: Corsina

texts.en:
Corsina is a 62-year-old widow with eight children, 1 attends school. She has had a food vending business for 15 years and is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Corsina requests 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

Corsina would like to repair and renovate her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 45 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marina is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Marina has been raising pigs for two years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 34 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Teresita is borrowing PHP 5000 through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Teresita has been raising pigs for 10 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 50 years old and married with five children. Norma works very hard to provide for them.

Norma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, liquor, home product care, and other groceries.

Norma has been in this business for 30 years. 

In the future, Norma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, liquor, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 35 years old and has five children, all of whom are in school. She is married. 

Rosita is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosita requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Rosita has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosita would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lorna is 35 years old and has one child who is in school.

Lorna has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Lorna requested a 15,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of  ready-to-wear clothing to sell.

Lorna has been in this business for four years. In the future, Lorna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of ready-to-wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marilyn is 34 years old and has two children who are in school.

Marilyn has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items like canned good, noodles, diapers, soft-drinks and school supplies.

Marilyn has been in this business for three years. In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, noodles, diapers, soft-drinks and school supplies.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 58 years old and has two children.

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Susana requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Susana has been raising pigs for 5 years now and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Susana would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Roberth

texts.es: Roberth, tiene la edad  de 43 años, está casado, vive con su esposa y sus hijos,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena geminación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la eroción, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Roberth is 43 years old, married, and lives with his wife and their children, who are his major priority.

With his loan he intends to purchase bean seeds of good quality, and to assure that they have a good germination. He will also buy organic fertilizers that will help to improve soil conditions, plus other products to apply to the planting. Roberth will also pay the laborers who prepare the land and those who help assure that rain water doesn't cause damage by erosion, plus those who apply fertilizers and tend the plants once they are developing, in this manner, assuring the good results.

Roberth intends to take advantage of the zone's good climate and soil conditions for this crop, and also to put in practice his experience of various years in managing basic grains. In addition, he wants to be able to buy the best products and of the best quality so that his crop may have achieve good development and sanitary conditions amounting to an adequate harvest. Most importantly, he hopes for a short production time.

With the harvest that Roberth wants to obtain, he plans to utilize the income for the wellbeing and education of his family and to comply with some family goals while continuing to invest more in his future crops. 

This is Roberth's first loan through FUDECOSUR. He has had no other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with the best facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant, fertilize, care for and harvest his bean crop, while caring for the land and avoiding erosion.

loans.name: Chigwirizano Group

texts.en:
Esnart is 38 years old and married with seven children. Esnart owns a grocery store in her community, where she sells different kinds of commodities. She runs this business in order to improve her family’s living standards and to pay school fees for her children. 

Esnart will use the loan to buy commodities that are currently not in stock such as soap and sugar. She plans on hiring someone to assist her in running the business and hopes to build a better house for her family.  Esnart thanks the Microloan Foundation for the training she received on ‘Saving and Culture’ as this will help her to further sustain her business. Esnart used the profits obtained from the previous loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy commodities for her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her son in repairing his lathe machine and some cutting tools

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to help her son in purchasing a motorized rickshaw body

loans.name: Malis

texts.en:
Malis, who lives with her farmer husband and two children, runs a grocery shop in Sampong Village. Both Malis and her husband always get up early to go to the farm and prepare their grocery shop. 

Malis's grocery shop is quite famous in this area. Most of the villagers in this area are her regular customers. Therefore, her business is pretty busy which makes her forget to charge her current energy source sometimes. A car battery is not reliable, as it has a short life span and is easily damaged. Sometimes the car battery runs out of energy without any alert, and Malis has to stop her business early before the sun sets. 

After getting a good recommendation from a neighbor that uses a solar home system, she decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy a solar home system. She believes this decision will improve her energy to run her business and also save utility fees. She won't have to worry about sudden power shut offs and wasting time charging the battery anymore.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

location.town: Sampong Village, Thma Andeurk commune, Chetr Borei

loans.name: Abdul Hakim Hadji

texts.en:
Abdul Hakim Hadji is a 38-year-old single man living in a rural community.  He has sold different accessories and cosmetics for 2 years. 

He wants to make this business more profitable and earn a higher income to help his family and save for his future. Due to financial difficulties, he requests 20,000.00 PHP to buy more accessories, cell phones, cosmetics, batteries, and dry goods.

loans.use: to buy more accessories, cell phones, cosmetics, batteries, and dry goods.

location.town: Brgy. San Pedro, Bagabag, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Brigido

texts.es: Brigido tiene 48 años de edad habita en casa propia con su esposa y sus 4 hijos de 18, 17, 12 y 6 años de edad, todos se encuentran estudiando. Él se dedica a prestar sus servicios como jornalero y también comercia granos básicos que el mismo cultiva, lo que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Brigido desea cambiar las láminas de las paredes y la madera, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: laminas, polines, clavos y madera para poder hacer las mejores en su vivienda y de esa forma darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Brigido is 48 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and their 4 children ages 18, 17, 12, and 6, who are all in school.  He works hiring himself out as a day laborer and also sells staple foods that he grows himself, which allows him to sustain his household.  Brigido wants to change the metal sheets of the walls and the wood, and for this reason he's requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase: metal sheets, purlins, nails, and wood to be able to make improvements to his home and in this way give a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheets, purlins, nails, and wood to be able to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
Eugenia tiene 60 años de edad, conviviente tiene un hijo de 17 años de edad el cual cursa secundaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucará.Vive en casa propia de material rústico por un lapso de más de 20 años, en la parte rural del distrito de Pomahuaca,que pertenece a la Provincia de Jaén, Región Cajamarca, Sierra Norte de Perú. Dicho distrito cuenta con servicios de agua y luz.

La actividad que realiza Eugenia es la venta de frutas así como bebidas gaseosa, golosinas cuenta con clientela de la zona asi como transportistas, las ventas las realiza en su domicilio ubicado en el sector san lorenzo - pomahuaca, con 15 años de experiencia en el rubro. Goza de muy buenas referencias personales y laborales.El destino del crédito será para invertir en su negocio surtiendo con más fruta y con nuevos productos, con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Eugenia is 60 years old. She lives with her partner and has a 17 year-old son who is in his second year at a national high school in the district of Pucará. She has lived in her own house, built of rustic materials, for more than 20 years. This is in the rural area of the district of Pomahuaca, which belongs to the province of Jaén, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru. The district has water and electric utilities. 

Eugenia’s business is the sale of fruits and also soft drinks and sweets. She has clientele from the area, such as transportation drivers. She makes her sales from her home, which is located in the neighborhood of San Lorenzo, Pomahuaca. She has been in this business for 15 years. She has good personal and work references. She will use the loan to invest in her business by buying more fruits and new products. With this she will earn greater income and thereby improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in her business by buying more fruits and new products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for fresh, processed meat and vegetables to sell at her stall

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a 33-year-old woman with five children, three attend school. Maricel has operated a general store for 6 years and works very hard to provide for them.

She requests 6,000 PHP through NWTF to buy bread, sugar, home care products, and other groceries.

In the future, Maricel would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy bread, sugar, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 36 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Wilma is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Wilma has been raising pigs for 5 years and also earns additional income from general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a 39-year-old married woman with two children, one attends school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur and has run  a soft-drink business for 7 years. 

Christine requests17,000 loan PHP through NWTF to buy soft-drinks and beverages to sell.

Christine would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks and beverages.

loans.name: Charito

texts.en:
Charito is 59 years old and married with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Charito has an Avon dealership business in the Philippines. Charito requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock of Avon products to sell.

Charito has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Charito would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of Avon products to sell.

loans.name: Yolly

texts.en:
Yolly is 32 years old and married with six children. With six children in school, Yolly works very hard to provide for them.

Yolly runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, bread, home care products, and other groceries.

Yolly has been in this business for 3 years.

In the future, Yolly would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, bread, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 47 years old and married with five children. With two children in school, Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa has a general store in the Philippines and requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Teresa has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned good and other personal care products.

In the future, Teresa would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Michelle Pauline

texts.en:
Michelle Pauline is 34 years old and has one child in school.

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Michelle Pauline requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

She has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Michelle Pauline would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 33 years old and is married with one child.

Emily works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Emily has borrowed and paid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from food vending.

Emily aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Nelly Del Carmen

texts.es:
Nelly, no estudio, está soltera porque su compañero de vida ya fallecio, tiene cinco hijos, pero no viven en casa con ella, porque están acompañados y tienen sus propios hogares, solo dos nietos viven con ella.

Nelly, trabaja con ganado de repasto bovino, lo ha hecho durante dos años y lo aprendio de su pareja y decidio seguir trabajando para obtener ingresos que le permitan tener lo necesario en casa y no depender solo de lo que sus hijos le dan.

Nelly, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto bovino, para cuidarlos, engordarlos y luego venderlos en un buen precio.

Sus sueños son, seguir trabajando lo mejor que pueda, para estar preparada cuando ya no pueda trabajar y asi no ser una carga para sus hijos, además sueña con volver a ver a uno de sus hijos que tiene 18 años de no verlo porque se fue para E.E.U.U.
texts.en:
Nelly did not go to school.  She is single because her life partner passed away.  She has five children, but they don’t live at home with her, because they are in relationships and have their own homes.  Only two grandchildren live with her.

Nelly works with pastured cattle.  She has done this for two years, and she learned it from her partner.  She decided to keep working to obtain income, which allows her to have household necessities and not depend solely on what her children give her.

Nelly needs the loan to buy pastured cattle, to care for them, fatten them up, and then sell them at a good price.

Her dreams are to keep working as best as she can, to be prepared when she can’t work anymore and thereby not to be a burden for her children.  She also dreams of getting to see one of her children again.  She hasn’t seen him in 18 years, because he went to the United States.

loans.use: to buy pastured cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new Juki sewing machine, zippers, and buttons for her tailoring services.

loans.name: Bav

texts.en: Bav and his wife run a fish distributing business with two dependent children. Their business needs a lot of preparation before they can distribute a product. Therefore, they need to get up early to prepare their shop before sun rises. Currently, they use car batteries to provide their business energy. However, car batteries are not reliable; they have a short life span and are easily damaged. Sometimes car batteries run out during the night, which reduces their working hours and family well-being. After getting good recommendations from neighbors that use solar home systems, Bav decided to apply for a KIVA loan to buy a solar home system. He believes this decision will improve his energy to run his business and also save utility fees.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

location.town: Ta Nguon Village, Dar Commune, Chetr Borei village

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de treinta y un años de edad, muy dedicado a su negocio, su padre le heredo un puesto de granos básicos en el mercado de su ciudad y él ha sabido administrarlo, con el paso del tiempo ha logrado ir prosperando cada vez más, sus ganancias han aumentado notablemente, tanto que pudo conseguir su propia casa, he independizarse de su madre. 
Este esforzado hombre solicitar la ayuda de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para que se le otorgue un préstamo y así comprar una mayor cantidad de granos básicos, su principal meta es ver su casa totalmente construida, además de devolverle a su madre todos los sacrificios que hizo por el cuándo fue pequeño.
texts.en: Jorge is a thirty-one year old man who is very dedicated to his business.
