He inherited from his father a stall in the city market selling staple goods and he has known how to administer it.  With the passage of time, he has been able to prosper more and more.  His profit has increased notably, so much that he's been able to get his own home and live independently from his mother.  This hard-working man is requesting the help of Kiva together with MiCrédito to offer him a loan and thus purchase a greater quantity of staple goods.  His main goal is to see his home totally completed, as well as to pay back his mother for all the sacrifices she made for him when he was small.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of staple goods.

loans.name: Jose Ricardo

texts.es:
José, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en los oficios domésticos, tiene tres hijos que viven en casa y están estudiando.

José, trabaja en la agricultura desde hace más de 16 años, lo aprendio de su padre y decidio hacerlo para obtener ingresos economico suficientes para el sustento de su familia y para tener granos básicos para la alimentación de su familia; tambien trabaja con ganado bovino; la distancia donde trabaja está a 1 kilómetro de su casa y su pareja le ayuda algunas veces.

José, está solicitando el préstamo para comprar insumos agricolas como pesticidas, herbicidas y abono para el cultivo de maíz y maicillo, esto le servira mucho porque podra seguir trabajando y preparar sus cultivos a tiempo.

Sus sueños son, seguir trabajando lo mejor que pueda para poder darles un mejor futuro a su familia, también desea que sus hijos estudien y se preparen academicamente; además sueña con reunirse con un hermano que está en E.E.U.U. desde hace muchos años.
texts.en:
José studied through third grade. He lives with his partner and she works as a homemaker. They have three children who live at home and are studying.

José has been working in agriculture for more than 16 years. He learned it from his father and he decided to do it in order to earn enough income to provide for his family and to have basic grains to feed them. He also works with cattle. Where he works is about 1 kilometer from his house and his partner helps him sometimes.

José is requesting the loan to buy agricultural inputs such as pesticides, herbicides, and manure for cultivating corn and sorghum. This will be very useful to him because he can continue working and have his crops ready on time.

His dream is to continue working as best he can so that he can provide a better future to his family. He also wants his children to study and prepare themselves academically. He also dreams of reuniting with a brother who has been in the United States for many years.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as pesticides, herbicides, and manure for cultivating corn and sorghum.

loans.name: Chea

texts.en: Chea and her husband are farmers living with four little children in the village of Ta Ngoun, which is far from the power grid. Chea and her husband have fought for their family for almost 20 years to expand their business and have their family living in a comfortable condition. She wants to reduce time and money on utility fees; however, her house has no reliable energy source. She has to go to charge the car battery every 2 or 3 days for daily usage. Car batteries make them spend every week. Chea and her husband want to save up more money every month for their children's future education. As a result, she is applying for a KIVA loan to buy high quality home solar energy. After using solar home energy, she believes her family condition would be better and safer. She can also save time and money on utilities.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

location.town: Ta Nguon Village, Vattanak Commune, Sambo District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medical equipment, injections, and medicines for her clinic.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy moto-rickshaw for her son's transportation services.

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San (pictured with his wife standing in front of their house) living with 3 children, earns a living by farming in the Sampong village. Spending day and night rising three children, he wants his family to live in a comfortable and healthy condition.

San wants to find a better solution to substitute car battery they currently use for energy because it is a time and money consuming source. Moreover, he wants his three children to live in safer environment since car batteries have an acidic substance that may cause an accident if kids carelessly touch it.

After attending community visit of a reliable solar home system provider, San decided to apply for KIVA to buy solar home energy. He believes solar home energy can enhance his living lifestyle in a comfortable and safe condition. He also can save more money from utility fee.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system.

location.town: Sampong Village, Thma Andeurk commune, Chetr Borei

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of fruit like watermelon, pineapple, etc. that will allow her to increase sales and profits from her business.

loans.name: Henie

texts.en:
Henie is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Henie is 36 years old and has four children who are in school.

Henie has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Henie has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Henie would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Ana Rubidia

texts.es:
Rubidia, de 35 años de edad, es ama de casa, debido al bajo nivel económico de sus padres, le fué imposible estudiar más de cuarto grado, está casada y junto a su esposo han procreado 4 hijos, dos no estudian y los otros dos estudian en la escuela cercana en su comunidad, su esposo no tiene ningún grado académico y se dedica a la agricultura desde muy pequeño.

Rubidia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años aproximadamente, su esposo le apoya mucho ya que conoce muy bien este trabajo, también se dedica a la venta de pan junto a sus hijos; se levantan muy temprano para hacer los quehaceres del hogar y luego van a vender pan a los alrededores de la comunidad, para obtener ingresos y cubrir algunas necesidades del hogar.

Rubidia, necesita el crédito para comprar un motor para regar la milpa y comprar los caños para que la cosecha sea abundante.

El sueño de Rubidia, es sacar adelante a su familia y tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Rubidia is 35 years old. She is a homemaker. Because of her parent’s economic situation, it was not possible for her to study past fourth grade. She is married and has 4 children with her husband. Two are not studying and two attend the nearby school in their community. Her husband didn’t go to school and has been working in agriculture since he was very young. 

Rubidia has been working in agriculture for approximately 20 years. Her husband supports her a lot because he understands this work. She also sells bread, along with her children. She gets up very early to do the chores around the house, and then later they go out to sell bread in areas near their town, in order to earn income and cover some of the household necessities.

Rubidia needs the loan to buy a pump for irrigating the cornfield and irrigation pipes so that the harvest will be abundant. 

Rubidia’s dream is to help her family get ahead and to have a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a pump for irrigating the cornfield and irrigation pipes so that the harvest will be abundant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her husband to purchase betel leaf, chopped areca nuts, and tobacco to sell from his paan shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her husband in purchasing charcoal for his firewood selling shop.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Analyn is 43 years old and has two children who are in school.

Analyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 29,500 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

She has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, Analyn would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Mbaa Matu Shg Group

texts.en:
Joshua is a 40-year-old  married man shown raising his hand in the photo. He is a member of Mbaa Matu SHG. He has three children and joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa  to benefit from enterprise development training. 

He raises poultry and is borrowing from Kiva to buy more chickens, poultry vaccines, and the chicken feed to boost his poultry business.  Joshua trusts that this will help him increase his income to enable him to meet his family's needs.  He wants to have decent housing, food, and educate his children. 

Joshua is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support. He promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to buy chicken, poultry vaccines, and chicken feed.

loans.name: Faith And Hope Women Group

texts.en:
The person raising her hand in photo is Farida, a member of Faith and Hope women group. She is 34 years old, married and blessed with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) in 2013.

Farida operates a grocery kiosk where she sells vegetables and fruits such as kale, cabbages, mangoes, oranges and carrots. She has benefited much from the HiH EA enterprise and financial development training since she has acquired skills that help her run and manage her business profitably.

She is borrowing a Kiva loan to add stock to her business which will help satisfy her customers' needs thus maximizing her profit. Income from this enterprise will help meet her family's basic needs such as education and medical care.

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits such as kales, cabbages, mangoes, oranges and carrots.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy recycled materials such as iron, plastic accessories and waste paper for her husband's shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cheese, pork, beans, corn, etc. and a new griddle for pupusas will enable her to increase her production in the business.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael tiene 43 años de edad y habita en casa propia con sus 3 hijos de 17, 16 y 9 años de edad. Él presta sus servicios como jornalero en una finca de su localidad desde hace 10 años y es así como él se gana la vida para llevar el sustento a su familia. Rafael desea hacer la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda ya que no cuenta con el servicio, por lo que actualmente se la pasan unos vecinos, es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cable eléctrico, caja térmica, rosetas y focos para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda, y de esa manera brindarles mayor comodidad a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rafael is 43 years old and lives in his own house with his 3 children who are 17, 16 and 9 years old.  He has provided his services as a day laborer on a farm in his town for 10 years and it is in this way that he earns a living to support his family.  Rafael wants to install electricity in his home since he doesn’t have the service; currently some neighbors share it with him.  

For this reason he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy electrical cable, a breaker box, light sockets and light bulbs to install electricity in his home and thus provide greater comfort to his children.

loans.use: to buy electrical cable, a breaker box, light sockets and light bulbs to install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Hikmatullo

texts.en:
Hikmatullo is a careful father. He was born in southern part of Tajikistan in 1982. He is living in a big town with his family. He is married and has two children. His wife is a tailor. She keeps household and also gets orders at home to sew traditional women dresses.

He has 11 years of experience working at aluminium factory. He is an economist at that factory. As a head of the family he ensures and takes care about his children and family. He appealed to IMON asking financial support to educate his children at school.

He awaits KIVA lenders kindness and hopes his children will be educated.

loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Jesie

texts.en:
Jesie works hard to support her family. She is married with four children and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Jesie requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

She has been in this business for 10 years now and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

Jesie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Virgilita

texts.en:
Virgilita is 65 years old and widowed with seven children.

She runs an agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Virgilita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Virgilita has been in this business for seven years and earns additional income from fish vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 54 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family.

She runs a farming vegetable in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ofelia has borrowed and paid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the farming vegetable for 20 years and also earns an income from vegetable vending.

Ofelia aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 43 years old and married with one child.

She runs an agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Eva is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Eva has been in this business for six years and earns additional income from poultry.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Cupertino

texts.es:
Cupertino, no tiene ningun grado de estudio, pero trabaja mucho por alimentar a sus 5 hijos y a su esposa, para que no les falte nada.

Cupertino, se dedica a la agricultura en los meses del invierno, especificamente siembra maiz y frijoles, ya que es un hombre responsable de su hogar.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar los insumos agricolas y fertilizantes para lograr una buena cosecha y preparar la tierra para comenzar a sembrar.
 
En el futuro espera que sus hijos terminen de estudiar y sean profesionales y obtengan un buen empleo.
texts.en:
Cupertino didn’t go to school, but he works hard to feed his 5 children and his wife, so that none of them lack for anything.

Cupertino works in agriculture during the winter months, specifically farming corn and beans, because he is a man who is responsible toward his household.

The loan he is requesting is for buying agricultural inputs and fertilizers so he can achieve a good harvest and prepare the land to start planting. 

For the future, he hopes that his children will complete their studies so they can be professionals and get good jobs.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and fertilizers so he can achieve a good harvest and prepare the land in order to start planting.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 61 years old and married with seven children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. 

Marcelina is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has been farming rice for five years and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice grains.

Marcelina is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, which is to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Jesus Alvaro

texts.es:
Alvaro, es un joven muy trabajador, está acompañado y tiene una hija de un año de edad, su pareja se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar.

Alvaro, se dedica a la elaboración de tejas en la época de verano y a los cultivos de granos básicos durante el invierno; no estudio pero es un joven inteligente a la hora de hacer cuentas y tiene una visión de mejorar su hogar.

Alvaro, necesita el crédito para poder hacer su milpa, este año quiere sembrar más, para poder cosechar más y obtener mejores ingresos al final del año.

Alvaro, sueña con arreglar su casita y darle una mejor condición de vida a su pareja y a su hija que son lo que más le importa en su vida.
texts.en:
Alvaro is a very hard-working young man. He is in a relationship and he has a one-year-old daughter. His partner is dedicated to household duties.

Alvaro makes tiles in the summer and farms basic grains during the winter. He does not study, but he is an intelligent young man when it comes to calculations. He has a vision about improving his home.

Alvaro needs a loan to be able to plant corn. This year, he wants to grow more in order to harvest more and earn better profits at the end of the year.

Alvaro dreams about renovating his home and giving his partner and daughter a better quality of life because they are the most important people in his life.

loans.use: plant corn

loans.name: Grupo Patzite Ixtahuacan Sector Alcaldia Group

texts.es:
Carlina (es la segunda del lado izquierdo de la foto de blusa verde menta) madre, hija, amiga y muy trabajadora es esta humilde mujer de 23 años de edad que día con día sueña y luchar por cada una de ellas ella es madre de dos pequeños de las edades de un año y cinco años vive en una comunidad de la aldea guiniales, para Carlina garantizar la salud y el bienestar de su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes esta actividad lo viene ella realizando desde hace 3 años, pero aparte de estar atendiendo su tienda también elabora hermosos trajes típicos de su región,  Carlina una gran mujer que no le teme a nada si no se esmera con lograr sus objetivos ahora esta solicitando un préstamo  junto a un grupo de señoras que también tienen el anhelo de superarse, ella utilizara el préstamo en la compra de más productos de abarrotes tales como azúcar, arroz, aceite, pastas, golosinas y gaseosas.
Carlina tiene el anhelo de hacer crecer su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y comprar más terrenos para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carlina (the second from the left in the photo, wearing a mint green blouse) is a mother, daughter, friend, and very hard working.  Day after day, this humble 23-year-old woman dreams and fights for every one of them.  She is the mother of two little ones, ages one and five.  She lives in a community in the town of Guiniales.  

In order to guarantee the health and wellbeing of her family, Carlina works buying and selling groceries.  She has been carrying out this business for three years, but apart from attending to her store, she also makes beautiful garments that are traditional in her region.  Carlina, a great woman who is not afraid of anything, makes a great effort to achieve her goals.

She is now requesting a loan, along with a group of women who also have the desire to succeed.  She will use the loan to buy more grocery items such as sugar, rice, oil, pasta, sweets, and soft drinks.

Carlina wishes to make her business grow, to improve her income, and to buy more land for her children.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as sugar, rice, oil, pasta, sweets, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy inventory such as dry goods, detergents, and biscuits for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es: Miguel de 31 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que vive en casa de sus padres desde hace varios años. Cuando Miguel aun no alcanzaba la mayoría de edad, inicio su experiencia de trabajo, aprendiendo el oficio de la albañilería, pero desde hace 6 años buscando la estabilidad económica, presta sus servicios de seguridad en una empresa cercana, por lo que se siente feliz y satisfecho. Apoyado en su trabajo Miguel logro reunir unos ahorros para construir su vivienda, pero estos no fueron suficientes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, lámina, polines y pines para terminar su sueño de una vivienda digna  propia.
texts.en: Miguel is a hard-working 31 year old man who has lived in his parent's home for many years.  Before Miguel reached adulthood, he began his work experience, learning the trade of masonry.  However, looking for more financial stability, for the past 6 years, he has provided security services for a local business, which makes him feel content and satisfied.  Supported by his job, Miguel was able to acquire savings to build a house, but these funds were not quite sufficient, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, metal sheets, purlins and pins to finish his dream of having his own dignified home.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, metal sheets, purlins and pins to finish his dream of having his own dignified home.

loans.name: Sulhiya

texts.en:
Sulhiya is a cheerful woman. She was born in northwestern part of Tajikistan in 1988. She is living in a beautiful natural place with her family. She is married and has two children. Her husband is an entrepreneur.

She had a dream to be a student and get higher education. In 2011, she entered to university to study accounting and economics. She wishes to be professional accountant and have a good place of work. Recently she is third year student.

Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to pay higher education costs this year. She appealed to IMON asking a loan to pay her university fees. She hopes to be supported and awaits your compassion.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a vulcanizing shop in the Philippines.

Teresita requested a 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional equipment for her shop. She has been in this business for 10 years now, and she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment for her shop.

loans.name: Ana Theresa

texts.en:
Ana Theresa is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from frozen foods. Ana Theresa is borrowing PHP 27,000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Ana Theresa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Erna

texts.en:
Erna is 58 years old, married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Erna has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 28,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Erna has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Erna would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Emelie

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Emelie works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from buying and selling fruits and vegetable. Emelie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell.

Emelie has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 36 years old and single with one child. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Teresita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items of groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

Teresita has been in business for four years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items of groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Ana Edelmira

texts.es:
Ana, está casada, tiene 5 hijos y todos viven con ella, trabaja y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, ella solo estudio hasta sexto grado, pero a pesar de eso ha logrado cosas importantes y ha sido de mucha ayuda para su comunidad y eso la hace sentirse orgullosa.

Ana, necesita el crédito para sembrar más maíz, ella quiere cosechar más para poder recuperar un poco la perdida de la cosecha pasada y así obtener un poco más de ganancia, para los gastos de su hogar.

Ana, es comerciante pero actualmente se dedica a ayudarle a su esposo en la milpa, siente bien ayudar a su esposo en el trabajo, ya que eso es para el bienestar de sus hijos y de ellos mismos.

Ana, desea que en el futuro sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales y para que tengan una mejor vida que la que ella tuvo.
texts.en:
Ana is married. She has 5 children and they all live with her. They work and help her with the household expenses. She only studied through sixth grade, but in spite of that she has achieved important things and has been of much help to her community, and this makes her feel proud.

Ana needs the loan to plant more corn. She wants to harvest more corn so she can recuperate some of the loss from the last harvest and thereby earn a little more income for her household expenses.

Ana is a merchant, but she is currently helping her husband in the cornfield. She feels good helping her husband with this work, because it’s for the wellbeing of their children and themselves.

Ana hopes that in the future her children will become professionals so they can have a better life than her.

loans.use: to plant more corn.

loans.name: Amévi

texts.fr: Agée de 28 ans, Amévi est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants. Amévi habite à Baguida et vend des cures dent en se promenant dans les quartiers. Amévi s’approvisionne trois fois dans le mois au marché. Amévi  demande ce crédit pour commander des troncs de cure dent pour vendre et augmenter son profit pour couvrir les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Amlévi is 28 years, married and the mother of two. She lives in Baguida and sells toothpicks as an itinerant vendor. Amlévi stocks up three times a month at the market. She is requesting this loan to stock up on toothpicks for resale and increase her earnings in order to meet her family's everyday expenses

loans.use: to buy nine cases of toothpicks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, and biscuits for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es: Zoila de 64 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que desde hace 5 años se gana la vida vendiendo productos de belleza por catálogo, actividad que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Zoila vive en casa de su  propiedad  desde hace 64 años, ya que esta fue herencia de sus padres y en ella habita junto a su nieta de 19 años de edad. Zoila desea que su negocio le brinde mejores ganancias, por lo que ha decidido comprar los productos de belleza por adelantado, ya que de esta manera el margen de ganancia es mayor, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lociones, cremas, maquillaje, desodorantes, etc., para su venta de productos de belleza.
texts.en:
Zoila is 64 years old. She is an entrepreneurial woman who has been making a living for the past 5 years by selling beauty products from catalogs. This business allows her to provide for her family. Zoila has been living in her own house for 64 years, since she inherited it from her parents. She lives with her 19 year-old granddaughter. 

Zoila wants for her business to bring her greater income, which is why she has decided to buy her beauty products ahead of time; this way her profit margin will be greater. She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase perfumes, lotions, make up, deodorants, etc. for her beauty product sales business.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, make up, deodorants, etc. for her beauty product sales business.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es: Adriana es una mujer muy luchadora, ella tiene un pequeño negocio de cría y venta de pollos de engorde. Actualmente tiene problemas con su granja, ya que se ha deteriorado con el tiempo. Es por ello que ella necesita un préstamo de un millón de colones para poder reparar y mejorar la grande, y de esta manera poder seguir dando el sustento a su familia.
texts.en: Adriana is a very hard-working woman.  She has a small business raising and selling broiler chickens.  Currently, she has problems with her farm, since it has deteriorated with time.  It's for this reason she needs a loan of a million colones to be able to repair and improve the farm, and in this way continue giving sustenance to her family.

loans.use: to improve her chicken farm.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.en:
Maria Teresa is 40 years old and married with five children. With three children currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Maria Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items like cooking oil, noodles, sanitary pads, coffee, cereals, etc. to sell. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Maria Teresa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like cooking oil, noodles, sanitary pads, coffee, cereals, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Necitas

texts.en:
Necitas is a married woman with four children. She is 53 years old and two of her children are still in school.

Necitas is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like peanuts, salt, cooking oil, etc. for her food vending business.

Necitas has been in this business for four years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like peanuts, salt, cooking oil, etc. for her food vending business.

loans.name: Vuthy

texts.en:
Vuthy, a farmer and also on staff at a company, lives in Preaek Chamlak village with his wife and five children. Farming with his wife during his free time, he wants to save more money for his children's future and also reduce the time he spends on charging batteries every week. 

Sometime because he is very busy, Vuthy doesn’t have time to charge the batteries, which means the whole family is in pitch black conditions during the night, disrupting their lives and the children's study. He is therefore requesting a Kiva loan to buy a high quality home solar energy system, which will improve their living conditions and save money.

loans.use: to pay for a home solar system

location.town: Preaek Chamlak Village, Kanh Chor Commune, Chhlong

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 49 years old, married and has two children, one of whom is in school. For 22 years now, she has been farming vegetables in the Philippines.

Merlyn has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business and is now requesting a PHP 22,000 loan to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies and install a sink in her beauty salon.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 47 years old and married with five children. One of her children is in school.

Anita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Anita has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Anita aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Malai

texts.en:
Malai is a farmer living with his wife and child in Sampong Village. On his seven hectare farm, he grows black pepper to enable his family to live in comfortable conditions. Malai wants to save money on utility fees since he spends a lot of money every week charging a battery that has a short life span and is unreliable. 

Sometimes when he is busy, Malai doesn’t have time to charge the battery, so the whole family is left in pitch black conditions. He is therefore applying for a Kiva loan to buy a high quality home solar system. With solar energy, Malai  believes his family's living conditions will be better and safer. He will also save time and money on utilities.

loans.use: to pay for a home solar system

location.town: Sampong Village, Thma Andeurk commune, Chetr Borei

loans.name: Elevi Antonio

texts.es:
Elevi, es bachiller, está casado y su esposa trabaja en los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo que está estudiando, en su casa vive también su suegra.

Elevi, trabaja con ganado de repasto desde hace más de cinco años, lo aprendio de su padre y decidio hacerlo para buscar un ingreso extra para su familia, tambien trabaja la agricultura y ademas trabaja como empleado en un sistema de agua potable.

Elevi, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto e insumos agricolas para preparar los cultivos, con este préstamo mejorara su negocio y podra tener buenas ganancias. 

Sus sueños son, seguir trabajando lo mejor que se pueda, para poder darles un mejor futuro a su familia y desea que su hijo estudie y se prepare academicamente.
texts.en:
Elevi is a high school graduate.  He is married and his wife works taking care of the household.  He has one child who attends school.  His mother-in-law also lives in with them.

Elevi has worked with grazing cattle for more than five years.  He learned the work from his father and decided to do it to seek extra income for his family.  He also works in agriculture and as an employee in a drinking water facility.

Elevi needs the loan to purchase grazing cattle and agricultural supplies to prepare his crops.  With this loan he will improve his business and be able to have good earnings. 

His dreams are to continue working the best that he can to be able to give his family a better future and he wants his son to study and be prepared academically.

loans.use: to purchase grazing cattle and agricultural supplies to prepare his crops.

loans.name: Grupo Las Vendedoras San Carlos Nahualate. Group

texts.es:
Clara  (es la señora de en medio de blusa color morado) es una mujer digna de admirar porque lucha todos los días para darles lo mejor a sus cinco hijos de las edades entre 3 y 15 años, para Clara el trabajo es una bendición porque es de donde provee sus ingresos, ella tiene un negocio de compra y venta de abarrotes desde hace seis años gracias a este negocio su familia tiene todo lo necesario, para Clara  seguir prosperando es muy importante es por ello que para hacer posible esta meta junto a un grupo de personas solicita un préstamo para comprar productos de abarrotes como azúcar, arroz, aceite,  y satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Clara tiene las esperanzas de contar con un local a la orilla de la carretera donde pueda vender mejor y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Clara (the woman in the middle with the purple blouse) is a dignified woman to admire because she strives every day to give the best to her five children, who are between 3 and 15 years old.  For Clara, work is a blessing because it is what provides her income.  For the past 6 years, she has had a business buying and selling groceries and thanks to this business her family has everything they need and for Clara, it is very important to continue prospering.  In order to make this goal possible, together with a group, she is requesting a loan to purchase grocery products like sugar, rice, and oil, to better satisfy the needs of her customers.  Clara has hopes of including a location beside the highway where she can sell more and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase grocery products like sugar, rice, and oil.

loans.name: Heang

texts.en:
Heang, a 61-year-old man with two children, has been working as village chief for 32 years in Ta Nguon village. Spending day- and night-time raising two children, he wants to have a comfortable life. Currently, he is still working as village chief and does farming during his free time. 

Heang wants to find a better energy source for his home. Heang has difficulty using battery power for home energy. He needs to recharge his battery every week. Once he found out that a solar home system is the solution he needs, Heang decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy solar home energy. He believes solar home energy can improve his lifestyle and make for more comfortable conditions.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

location.town: Ta Nguon Village, Vattanak Commune, Sambo District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, beams and nails to replace the roof of her home and provide her family with better security and a better quality of life.

loans.name: Latofat

texts.en:
Latofat is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1978. She is living in a village with her big family, is married and has five children. Her husband is a worker at a collective farm. She is a tailor. She sews traditional women and men clothing and dresses. She has regular clients among residents of her rural area. Each week she sells 2-3 clothes at the domestic market and buys necessary items for her sewing. 

She is sick, but has not money to be treated. She appealed to IMON asking financial support to be treated at the hospital. She awaits Kiva lenders compassion.

loans.use: to be treated at hospital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn and wood, to make tortillas.

loans.name: Jean Pierre David

texts.es:
Jean Pierre es un joven estudiante que vive con sus padres, a quienes ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar y también ayuda a cuidar a su hermanita de 5 años y un hermano de 16 años que es Autista.

Él está estudiando la carrera de Mecatrónica Industrial porque le gusta crear, innovar, mejorar. Le gusta la mecánica, electrónica, robótica, informática; y esta carrera elegida tiene todo lo que le gusta. Él está estudiando hace un año y aún le falta 2 años y medio para terminarla. Le gusta mucho la carrera que escogió, disfruta mucho lo que le están enseñando y eso se refleja en sus calificaciones.

Siente que a través de esta carrera podrá beneficiar a su familia, porque desea mejorar su calidad de vida, ayudar en los gastos de su hogar, ayudar en los estudios de su hermanita menor y posteriormente crear en su propio negocio, aparatos autónomos para optimizar tiempos.

El único obstáculo que tiene actualmente, es el medio económico en el que se encuentra su familia. Es por ello, que está solicitando el crédito recurriendo a KIVA, para no dejar de estudiar esta carrera que tanto le fascina. Lo que él más desea cuando termine de estudiar, es convalidar con la universidad y así aprovechar su juventud en seguir estudiando. Piensa trabajar en una empresa grande o crear su propio negocio donde pueda desempeñarse con todo lo que aprendió.

Gracias a este préstamo le ayudará a su madre que es la que se encarga de los gastos, ya que la aliviará bastante sabiendo que él podrá continuar con sus estudios, estará más preparado y dispuesto a muchos retos laborales. Jean Pierre, se siente muy contento, más tranquilo, sabiendo que podrá estudiar su carrera que es su mayor anhelo.

Su mayor sueño en la vida es trabajar y alternar con más estudios, comprar una casa para su familia, crear maquinarias grandes para empresas de prestigios y ser el mejor en su profesión.

El obstáculo más grande que tiene es el factor económico, adicional a ello también lo tuvo él mismo cuando terminó el colegio y tenía muchos sueños, quiso estudiar muchas cosas al punto que no supo por donde empezar. Ahora ya sabe cuál es su camino y lo encontró en SENATI estudiando la carrera que tanto le gusta.

Jean Pierre, se siente muy agradecido con las personas que lo apoyarán porque gracias a ellos y a este programa podrá cumplir su sueño de ser un excelente profesional.

Por último, Jean Pierre les quiere dejar un mensaje:"Agradezco mucho el apoyo tan grande que hacen y que sigan apoyando a otros jóvenes como yo de bajo recursos económicos. Muchas gracias KIVA!!"
texts.en:
Jean Pierre is a young student who lives with his parents. He helps them with the household chores and also helps to care for his 5 year-old sister and a 16 year-old brother who is autistic.

He is studying Industrial Mechatronics because he likes to create, innovate, and improve. He likes mechanics, electronics, robotics, and information systems; the branch of study that he has chosen has everything he likes. He has been studying for one year and he still has 2 years left to finish. He really likes the course of studies he has chosen, he enjoys very much what they are teaching, and this is reflected in his grades.

He feels that through this course of study, his family will be able to benefit. He desires to improve his quality of life, help out with the household expenses, help his family with his little sister’s studies, and eventually start his own business – automatic devices for optimizing time use. 

The only obstacle that he currently faces is his family’s economic situation. For this reason, he is requesting a recurrent loan from Kiva, so that he won’t have to quit studying what he loves so much. His greatest hope is that when he finishes studying he will get credit in the university so that he can take advantage of his youth to continue studying. He plans to work at a big business or start his own business where he can work with everything that he will have learned.

With this loan he will help his mother, who is in charge of the expenses. This would make her feel relieved, knowing that he’ll be able to continue with his studies. He will be better prepared and ready for all kinds of work challenges. Jean Pierre is very happy, calmer, knowing that he will be able to study, which is his greatest wish.

His greatest dreams in life are to work and alternate that with more studying, to buy a house for his family, to create great big machines for prestigious companies, and to be the best in his profession.

His biggest challenge is the economic factor. In addition to this is the problem he had after finishing middle school and he had so many dreams. He wanted to study lots of things, to the point where he didn’t know where to start. Now he knows his path, and he found it at SENATI, taking the course of study that he enjoys so much.

Jean Pierre feels very grateful to the people who will support him because, thanks to them and to this program, he will achieve his dream and be an excellent professional. 

Lastly, Jean Pierre wants to give a message: “I am very grateful for the wonderful support, and please continue supporting other young people like me of scarce economic resources. Thank you very much Kiva!”

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees to study Industrial Mechatronics, so that he can eventually have his own business.

loans.name: Pablo Francisco

texts.es:
Pablo es un pequeño productor de café en el departamento de Jinotega. Su finca es de 5.6 hectáreas de las cuales 3.2 son de café. Su visión es duplicar el área de café en su finca de manera gradual para lo cual está gestionando recursos acordes a esta actividad, aprovechando las condiciones favorables que tiene su finca para la producción de este rubro. 

En los últimos años don Pablo ha logrado cosechar un promedio de 41 quintales de café pergamino. Para este año, está solicitando un financiamiento para garantizar la mano de obra y la compra de insumos y materiales que le permita tener bajo control las plagas y enfermedades en las áreas de café cosechero que tiene actualmente. 

Con la implementación de estas actividades, logrará garantizar y mejorar la producción en el ciclo 2015-2016, y hacer frente a la inestabilidad en el mercado de café, lo cual también ha enfrentado al estar certificado bajo el sello Fairtrade.
texts.en:
Pablo is a small coffee farmer in the department of Jinotega.  His land is 5.6 hectares, of which 3.2 are coffee.  His vision is to gradually double the area of coffee growth on his farm.  He is generating income due to this activity, and wants to take advantage of the favorable conditions his farm has to grow this crop.

The recent years Pablo has harvested an average of 41 quintals of dried coffee beans.  This year, he is requesting a loan to pay for labor on his farm, and to buy supplies and materials that will allow him to control pests and disease in the areas where he is currently growing coffee.  With these measures taken, he will ensure and improve his harvest in the 2015-2016 season, and confront the instability of the coffee market, which he has previously faced to become certified under the Fairtrade seal.

loans.use: to pay for labor, farming supplies and materials to help ensure a good harvest.

loans.name: Romelia Elizabeth

texts.es: Romelia de 26 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica desde hace varios años a atender su negocio de venta de papelería, copias e impresiones en el cual atienda a los alumnos de los centros escolares cercanos. Romelia vive junto a su grupo familiar en vivienda propia desde hace varios años, por lo que se siente feliz de contar con un techo donde vivir. Ella desea cumplir con la demanda de productos que sus clientes solicitan, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: papel bond blanco y de colores, diversidad de globos, confeti, entre otros productos para surtir su mercadería y cumplir con la demanda de productos que sus clientes solicitan.
texts.en:
Romelia, 26 years old, is a hard working woman who has been working for several years tending to her business selling stationery, and copying and printing, for students attending nearby schools.

Romelia has been living with family members in their own home for some years for which she feels happy to have a roof over her head.

She wants to meet the demand for products that her clients want which is why she is asking for a loan through FUSAI in order to invest in: white and colored bond paper, a variety of balloons, confetti, and other products to stock her merchandise and meet the demand for products her customers are asking for.

loans.use: to invest in: white and colored bond paper, a variety of balloons, confetti, and other products to stock her merchandise

loans.name: Nurmuhammad

texts.ru: Веселый парень из района Руми. Нурмухаммад любит животных. Ему 39 лет, и он привык получать от жизни все что возможно. Нурмухаммад живет в районе Руми вместе семьей. Мама и жена домохозяйка. Дети еще маленькие. Нурмухаммад сам трудится, и обеспечить семью. У него есть коровник  во дворе. Он там выращивает несколько козы. Нурмухаммад  с детства нравилось возиться с животными. Он решил приобрести еще коза и увеличить их численность.  У Нурмухаммад мечта построить большой коровник и приобрести больше козы. Он нуждается на поддержке.
texts.en:
A cheerful man from the Rumy region, Nurmuhammad loves animals. He is 39 years old, and he is accustomed to getting all that he can out of life. Nurmuhammad lives in Rumy with his family. His wife, the mother of their children, is a housewife, and their children are still little. Nurmuhammad works to provide for his family. He has a barn in his yard, and he raises a few goats himself. Since his childhood, Nurmuhammad has always liked keeping animals. 

Nurmuhammad has decided to purchase more goats to increase the number of goats he has. Nurmuhammad dreams of building a large barn and buying many goats. He is in need of support.

loans.use: to buy a few goats.

loans.name: Urazgul

texts.ru: Уразгул милая великодушная женщина из района Хуросон. Ей 42 года. Она настоящая мать героиня шестерых детей. У нее два дочки и четыре сына. Дочки и младший сын учатся в средней школе, а старшие сыновья уехали на заработки на чужбину. Уразгул уже давно занимается животноводством. Она решила, что набралась опыта, чтобы расширить деятельность. Она собирается на заемные деньги купить несколько голов телят и барашек. Уразгул верит, что найдутся люди, которые ее поддержат в ее решении. Поддержите Уразгул.
texts.en:
Urazgul is a sweet, generous woman from the Khuroson region. She is 42 years old. She is a real "mother-heroine" of 6 children: she has two daughters and four sons. Her daughters and youngest son study in secondary school, and the older sons are migrant workers. 

Urazgul has raised animals for a long time, and she has decided that she has enough experience to expand her business. She intends to buy a few calves and lambs with the money she borrows. Urazgul believes that people can be found who will support her in her decision. Support Urazgul.

loans.use: to buy a few calves and lambs.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, de 27 años de edad, está soltero, vive con sus padres y de él depende solo su mamá. 

Manuel, es empleado en una gasolinera de la zona, también tiene una fotocopiadora, su trabajo está a 20 minutos de su casa y su novia le ayuda en el negocio.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar mobiliario para la fotocopiadora y para reparar una motocicleta, con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar su negocio. 

Manuel, sueña con construir su propia casa e independizarse de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel, 27 years old, is single.  He lives with his parents and his mother depends solely on him.  Manuel is an employee of a gas station in the area.  He also has a photo copy shop.  His work is 20 minutes from his house and his girlfriend helps him in the business.  He needs the loan to buy furniture for the copy shop and to repair a motorcycle.  With the help of the loan he will be able to improve his business.

Manuel dreams of building his own house and becoming independent from his family.

loans.use: to buy furniture for his copy shop and to repair a motorcycle.

loans.name: Mayerling Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mayerling es una pequeña productora de café en una comunidad de Jinotega. Vive con su esposo en su finca de 8mz de las cuales 3 son de café. Esta pequeña productora maneja su finca bajo los criterios de certificación de comercio justo, y en los últimos años ha venido mejorando su finca, siendo parte de este proceso la renovación de 1.5 mz de café, con lo cual ha logrado incrementar los rendimientos de su producción.

Para este año, Mayerling está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que le permita garantizar un plan de manejo integrado de plagas y enfermedades en sus plantaciones. Esta inversión contribuirá a incrementar la producción en este ciclo. Todo esto derivará en mejores ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Mayerling is small coffee farmer in the Jinotega community.  She lives with her husband on her farm of 8mz (1.7 acres/mz), 3 of which are coffee.  This small farmer manages her farm under the criteria of Fairtrade certification.  In recent years she has improved her farm, the replanting of 1.5mz of coffee being part of this process, which has increased the return from her production.

This year, Mayerling is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers that will allow her to manage disease and pests in her fields.  This investment will contribute to the increase of production this season.  All of this will result in a greater income for the wellbeing of her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers to ensure a good coffee harvest.

loans.name: Betty Elizabeth

texts.es:
Betty es una joven de 25 años de edad, madre soltera de un niño de 1.5 años y vive en una comunidad de Jinotega, al norte de Nicaragua. Desde hace 5 años, posee una pequeña finca de 2 manzanas de las cuales 1.5 son de café. Hasta ahora, ha obtenido 2 créditos de la Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC), a través de la cual está integrado al proceso de certificación Comercio Justo. 

Para este año, esta pequeña productora requiere un financiamiento para la compra de abono y fertilizantes que le permitan garantizar el mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de café, y con ello incrementar los rendimientos productivos de su finca.

El sueño de Betty es dar a su hijo mejores condiciones económicas y oportunidades de estudio, para lo cual se esfuerza diariamente a fin de proveer a su hogar todo lo necesario.
texts.en: Betty is a 25-year-old woman and single mother to a boy aged 18 months. She lives in a village in Jinotega, in the north of Nicaragua. For the last five years, she has owned a small plantation measuring two "manzanas" (1 manzana = 1.74 acres), three quarters of which is used to grow coffee. To date, she has received two loans from the Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (Village Community Action Association or "PAC"), which have allowed her to obtain Fair Trade certification. This year, this small producer needs a loan to buy manure and fertilizer to be able to maintain her coffee plantation and to increase its yield. Betty's dream is to provide better economic conditions and educational opportunities for her son, and for this reason she works hard every day to provide him with everything he needs.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Тожинисо живет и работает в Чиликуле. Там же у нее муж и дети. Самой Тожинисо 55 лет. Ее муж занимается разнорабочем. Тожинисо работает учительницей в школе. Но успевает, и заняться хозяйством и работой на земле. Работа не земле не легкий труд, но Тожинисо не боится трудностей и дети ей помогают. Тожинисо 25 лет работает на земле. Она уже профессионал в своей работе. Тожинисо в этой сезоне посадила помидоры и картофель. Для обработки урожая нужны минеральные удобрения, чтобы их купить, у нее нет определенная сумма денег. Таким образом, Тожинисо срочно нуждается в кредите.
texts.en:
Tojiniso lives and works in Jilikul. She also has a husband and children there. Tojiniso is 55 years old, and her husband works as a laborer. Tojiniso is a teacher in a school. However, she finds the time to work on her farm and do agricultural work. Farming is not easy work, but Tojiniso is not afraid of hard work, and her children help her. Tojiniso has been farming for 25 years. She is now a professional at her work. 

This season, Tojiniso planted tomatoes and potatoes. In order to cultivate her harvest, she needs mineral fertilizers, but she does not have the necessary amount of money to buy them. Therefore, Tojiniso is urgently in need of a loan.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Iliana Yanet

texts.es:
Iliana es una mujer con grandes propósitos en la vida, pues ella gracias al entusiasmo que le puso a sus estudios y con el apoyo de sus padres Iliana se logró graduar de trabajadora social, gracias a esta profesión ahora se encuentra desempeñando como trabajadora social en una de las instituciones del gobierno ella tiene dos años de ejercer su  profesión, con lo poco que gana mantiene a sus dos hijos de la edades entre 5 y 7 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez. Para Iliana ofrecerle a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida es lo primordial por lo que ahora se ve a la necesidad de construirles un cuarto donde su dos hijos puedan acomodarse mejor, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente por tal razón solicita un préstamo  para poder comprar materiales de construcción como block, arena, cemento y hierro.
El gran sueño de Iliana es que logre construir este cuarto para contar con  algo propio y que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en: Iliana is a woman with a great purpose in life. Thanks to the enthusiasm she puts into her studies and the support from her parents, Iliana managed to graduate and become a social worker. Thanks to this profession, she now is employed as a social worked at a government institution. She has two years of experience in her profession. With the little that she earns, she takes care of her two children who are five and seven years old. This humble family lives in a community in Suchitepéquez. In order for Iliana to offer her children a good quality of life, it is necessary for her to build a room for the two children where they live more comfortably. However, one of the difficulties that she is experiencing is that she does not have enough money. This is the reason she is requesting a loan to purchase construction materials like bricks, sand, cement and iron. Iliana's big dreams are to be able to build this room in order to have something of her own and that her family can live a better life.

loans.use: purchase construction materials

loans.name: Maria Agustina

texts.es: María tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 7 años de edad a la que apoya para que estudie. María se gana la vida con su venta de tortillas desde hace 8 años, y es gracias a su amabilidad y calidad de sus productos que cada día cuenta con una gran cantidad de productos. María siempre está buscando la manera de mejorar su calidad de vida, y ha decidido invertir en maíz por mayor para que sus ganancias sean mejores, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en maíz para su venta de tortillas.
texts.en: Maria is 48 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their seven-year-old daughter, whom she supports in her studies. Maria has made a living selling tortillas for the past eight years, and thanks to her friendliness and the quality of her product she sells a large quantity every day. Maria is always looking for ways to improve her quality of life and has decided to invest in buying corn at wholesale so that she can make more profit. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in corn for her tortilla business.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Safarmo

texts.ru: Сафармо 55 лет. Она из Восеъ. Сафармо развелась с мужем. У нее двое дочери, им 16 и 19 лет. Младшая дочка учится в средней школе. Старшая дочка ведет домашнее хозяйство и помогает маме в работе. Сафармо более 5 лет, шьет и кроит национальные платья по заказу. В день она может сшить даже по 2 национальной одежды. Она ответственная и трудолюбивая женщина. Сафармо никогда не боялась трудиться. Это видно по результатам ее работ. Ей нравится создавать новые образы для женщин и вдохновляет ее благодарные лица клиенток. Сафармо до сегодняшнего дня шила на этой машинке. Она хочет приобрести новую современную швейную машинку, чтобы сшить больше платье и увеличить доход. Сафармо заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Safarmo is 55 years old and is from Vose.  Safarmo is divorced from her husband.  She had two daughters  who are 16 and 19 years old.  Her younger daughter is in high school and her older daughter takes care of the house and helps her mother with work.  For more than 5 years Safarmo has been sewing and tailoring traditional dresses to order.  In a day she can sew 2 items of traditional dress.  She is a responsible and hardworking woman.  Safarmo has never been afraid of hard work, and it is evident in the results of her work.  She likes to create new looks for women and is inspired by the grateful faces of her clients.  Up until now Safarmo has been sewing everything on this machine - she wants to purchase a new, modern sewing machine in order to sew more dresses and to increase her income.  Safarmo expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to purchase a modern sewing machine

loans.name: Noe

texts.es: Noé de 36 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos los dos mayores de 12 y 4 años de edad y el más pequeño de 22 días de nacido. Noé es un padre responsable que se gana la vida con su negocio de taller y venta de repuestos de bicicleta desde hace 13 años, por lo que cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos, por lo que se siente muy feliz de poder llevar el sustento a su hogar. Noé siempre buscando brindar lo mejor a su familia está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: repuestos para bicicleta, desarmadores, tornillos, etc., para brindar una mejor calidad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Noé is 36 years old. He lives in his own house with his life companion and their three children: the two oldest are 12 and 4 years old, and the youngest one is 22 days old. Noé is a responsible father who has earned his living with the business of a shop and sale of bicycle spare parts for 13 years. For this reason he has a great amount of customers who request his products, and this is why he feels very happy to be able to support his family. Always looking for ways to give his family the best, Noé is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest in: bicycle spare parts, screwdrivers, screws, etc., in order to give a better quality of products to his customers.

loans.use: To invest in: spare parts for bicycles, screwdrivers, screws, etc. in order to give a better quality of products to his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in buying sand and cement to cover the floor and walls of her home.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas un padre de familia que lucha día con día para sacar adelante a sus hijos, él es padre de tres niños de las edades entre 5 y 11 años que son su razón de vivir, el para darles lo mejor se dedica a la  albañilería desde hace 10 años, gracias a este trabajo ha logrado cubrir los gastos de la casa, pero para obtener otros ingresos se dedica a la crianza de pollos. Tomas con el afán de darle a su familia más comodidad ha tomado la decisión de construir una casa mucho más amplia y con mejores comodidades, aunque una de las dificultades que él tiene es que no tiene el capital suficiente  para poder comprar sus materiales como arena, cemento, block y hierro.
Tomas guarda las esperanzas de contar con el préstamo para poder realizar la construcción y ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Tomas is a father who works hard every day to support his three children, aged between five and eleven. His children are his reason for living and he has worked hard as a builder for the last ten years in order to provide the best for them. Thanks to this job, he has been able to cover the household expenses, but he also raises chickens to supplement his income. In order to make his family more comfortable, Tomas has decided to build them a house that is much bigger and has better fittings. One of his problems is that he does not have enough money to buy materials, such as sand, cement, cinder blocks and iron. Tomas hopes to receive this loan so that he can begin building and give his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Lila

texts.en:
Jacel is years old and is the third of three children in the family. Her mother Lila supports the family through her general store business in the Philippines.

Jacel is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology and is currently in the third of this four-year course.

Lila is borrowing PHP 30,000 to pay for tuition fees for her daughter Jacel, for the first semester of the school year 2015-16.

When she graduates, Jacel plans to be gainfully employed in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She has a fishing in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like vegetable vending.

Lilia dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Gabriela Angie

texts.es:
Gabriela es una joven estudiante de Diseño Gráfico, carrera que escogió porque le agrada mucho que las personas vean lo que ella quiere expresar a través de sus diseños. Gabriela, espera poner su propia editorial para poder apoyar a su familia. Actualmente, se encuentra cursando el segundo año de la carrera, aún le falta 2 años para concluir sus estudios.

Le va muy bien en sus estudios, por lo que no quiere dejarlos. Pero se le presenta el mayor obstáculo para su familia, que es el factor económico, porque sus padres están pasando por una difícil situación económica. Ella piensa trabajar en una editorial o alguna empresa de diseño cuando termine de estudiar.

Ella recurre al apoyo de KIVA al solicitar este préstamo, el cual lo utilizará para cancelar la deuda pendiente del segundo semestre académico. La manera como le ayudará la obtención de este crédito es porque podrá estar más tranquila en cuanto al pago. Ella se siente muy feliz al haber logrado este crédito, porque siente que podrá continuar con su carrera, lo cual la hace muy feliz.

Su mayor sueño en la vida es ser caricaturista, escritora y una gran profesional. Otro de sus sueños es que las personas al ver sus dibujos puedan saber que pueden hacer lo que más desean sin miedo al que dirán.

Gabriela quiere expresarles a KIVA lo siguiente:"Gracias por lo que están haciendo a miles de personas, incluyéndome, porque ustedes están permitiendo que las personas cumplan sus sueños y metas de estudiantes que en verdad queremos avanzar".
texts.en: Gabriela is a young graphic design student, a degree that she chose because she likes people to see what she expresses through her drawings. Gabriela wants to start her own publishing company to be able to support her family. Right now, she is in the second year of her degree and she still has two more years to go. She is doing very well in her studies and for that reason does not want to drop out. However, the biggest obstacle for her family is financial, as they are having money troubles right now. Gabriela hopes to work at a publishing company or another design company when she finishes her studies. She came to Kiva to request a loan, which she will use to pay off her debts from the second academic semester. Obtaining this loan will put her mind at ease about the payments. She is very happy to have received the loan, because in this way she will be able to continue her degree. Her biggest dream is to become a cartoonist, writer and a successful professional. Another of her dreams is for the people who see her drawings to be able to realize that they can do whatever they want, without being scared of what people say. Gabriela wants to say the following to Kiva: "Thank you for what you are doing for thousands of people, including me, because you are helping students that really want to succeed to fulfill their dreams and goals."

loans.use: to pay for her graphic design degree..

loans.name: Zeboniso

texts.ru: Зебонисо  49 лет. Она домохозяйка. Зебонисо не замужем и не имеет детей. Она на районе Восеъ живет вместе братиком и невесткой. Братику 41 лет, невестке 35 лет. Зебонисо веселая, активная швея. Она дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. Этой швейной машинке очень много лет, и она служила много для Зебонисо. Сейчас пришло время поменять швейную машинку, потому что она уже устарела, на ней Зебонисо не может нормально шить одежду.  Теперь Зебонисо  купить профессиональную швейную машинку на сумму от кредита, чтобы брать больше заказы на шитье национальных платьев. У Зебонисо имеет массу времени, чтобы у себя дома брать заказы на шитье и в дальнейшем развить свой маленький бизнес.
texts.en: Zeboniso is 49 years old and a homemaker.  Zeboniso is unmarried and has no children, but lives with her younger brother and sister-in-law in Vose.  Her brother is 41 years old and her sister-in-law is 35.  Zebosino is a cheerful, active seamstress, and sews women's clothing out of her home.  Her sewing machine is very old, and has served Zeboniso for many years.  Zeboniso now needs to change sewing machines because her current machine is old and Zeboniso cannot sew clothing normally on it.  Zeboniso is going to purchase a professional sewing machine with the money from her loan so that she can accept more orders to sew traditional dresses.  Zeboniso has a lot of time to take orders and to further develop her small business.

loans.use: to purchase a professional sewing machine

loans.name: Jennie

texts.en:
Jennie was encouraged that she was granted an 8,000 PHP loan, which she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her general store. Through her earnings, she is able to send her elementary child to school and meet their daily living expense.

Jennie is a business-minded woman. Aside from her small general store, she is also an Avon dealer. She does her best to sell her products, which are mostly underwear, footwear and toiletries, especially now that the school year has started in the Philippines. To help her improve her sales from her small general store and from her personal products business, she would like to request a PHP 10,000 loan to buy more grocery items like instant noodles, canned goods, bread, beverages and frozen foods to sell. Part of the loan she will use to buy personal products to fill the orders of her regular customers. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Jennie has a simple dream and that is to always have a happy and healthy family. She desires her child to get a college education. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and personal products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials to make hammocks.

loans.name: Rina Lisseth

texts.es:
Rina, de 44 años de edad, está soltera, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su madre porque se encuentra invalida a causa de un derrame cerebral y ella es quien la cuida, también viven ahí sus dos hijas.

Rina, se dedica a la venta de cócteles de marisco en su casa y sus clientes son personas que comercializan ganado en el tiangue de su ciudad, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió gracias a su madre.

Rina, necesita el crédito para poder comprar mariscos para elaborar los cócteles y seguir complaciendo a sus clientes.

Su sueño es, tener un local propio donde pueda vender sus cócteles y poder incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Rina, 44 years old, is single. She has 2 children and lives with her mother because she is ill due to a brain hemorrhage and she is the one who cares for her.  Her two daughters also live there. 

Rina works selling shellfish cocktails in her house and her customers are people who sell livestock in the market in her city. She learned everything she knows, thanks to her mother.

Rina needs the loan to be able to purchase shellfish to make the cocktails and to be able to continue pleasing her customers. 

Her dream is to have her own retail space where she can sell her cocktails and be able to increase her sales.

loans.use: to be able to purchase shellfish to make cocktails.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en casa propia al lado de sus dos hijos de 23 y 19 años quienes trabajan para aportar con las necesidades básicas del hogar. Mercedes desde hace bastante tiempo  se dedica a prestar sus servicios en una empresa que fabrica productos desechables y gracias  a la paga por su desempeño y buena labor le permite obtener los ingresos económicos para sacar adelante a su familia. Mercedes está preocupada porque la época de invierno se aproxima y el techo de su casa está bastante deteriorado por lo que teme que con las lluvias pueda presentar filtraciones que pongan en riesgo sus pertenencias  materiales y la estabilidad de su familia, es por ello que ha tomado la decisión de adquirir un crédito a FUSAI y con el monto otorgado comprar: lamina y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y de esta manera brindar una mejor seguridad para su hogar.
texts.en: Mercedes is 49 years old. She is a single mother and lives in her own house along with her two children, ages 23 and 19, who work to help with the basic needs of the household. For quite a while, Mercedes has worked at a business which makes disposable products and thanks to the pay she gets for her performance and quality work, she has been able to get the income to get ahead with her family. Mercedes is worried because winter is approaching and the roof on her house is rather deteriorated so she fears that the rain can leak in which puts her material possessions and the stability of her family at risk. For this reason, she has decided to get a loan from FUSAI and, with the granted amount, purchase metal sheeting and nails to replace the roof on her house and in this way offer her household better security.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting and nails to replace the roof on her house and in this way offer more security to her household.

loans.name: Moinav

texts.ru: 38 летняя жительница района Пяндж Моинав. Она развелас с мужем и у нее один единственный сын. Сын женат, и он находится на заработках загранице, чтобы помочь маме обеспечить семью. Невестка домохозяйка. Моинав дома предоставляет услуги портнихи у около 8 лет. У нее имеется старая советская ручная швейная машинка. Моинав хорошо справляется со своей работой,  но у нее проблема с машинкой. Он решила купить новую электрическую швейную машинку, чтобы ускорить процесс работы и привлечь себе больше клиентов. Для завершения данной операции у нее нет денег, и Моинав собирается взять кредит. Вы можете помочь ей с финансовыми трудностями. Она будет очень рада.
texts.en: Moinav is a 38 year old resident of Pyandj.  She is divorced from her husband and has one son.  Her son is married and works abroad to help his mother provide for the family.  Her daughter-in-law is a homemaker.  Moinav has been working as a dressmaker out of her home for nearly 8 years.  She has an old, soviet, manual sewing machine.  Moinav is good at her work, but she has problems with her sewing machine.  She decided to purchase a new, electric sewing machine in order to speed up her work and get more clients.  She does not have the money to go through with this plan, and so Moinav is planning to get a loan.  You can help her with her financial difficulties - she will be very happy.

loans.use: to purchase a new, electric sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of bricks, sand, and cement to build a retaining wall for her home.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ana is 44 years old and two of her children are in school.

Ana has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Ana has been in this business for 14 years. In the future, Ana would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is 50 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school, Avelina works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of household goods to sell.

Avelina has been in this business for 11 years.

In the future, Avelina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of household goods to sell.

loans.name: Aiza

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Aiza works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of coconut wine business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Aiza is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy more gallons of coconut wine to sell.

Aiza has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more gallons of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: María Elia

texts.es:
María, de 72 años de edad, no estudio porque la escuela estaba muy lejos y sus padres eran muy pobres, está casada, su esposo se dedica a la agricultor y ella a tejer hamacas y matates, todos sus hijos tienen sus propios hogares.

María, desde pequeña aprendió a tejer hamacas y matates, ya que sus padres a eso se dedicaron y cuando se caso siempre tuvo que trabajar duro, porque tenia varios hijos a quien mantener, también hubo un tiempo que le 
ayudaba a su esposo en los trabajos de siembra de maíz, ahora solo él trabaja sembrando maíz y frijol para darle lo 
necesario.

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar fertilizantes como: abono y pesticidas, ya que se acerca el tiempo de abonar la milpa para que crezca fuerte y pueda dar una buena producción de maíz, de esa manera lograra tener una mejor calidad de vida ella y sus dos nietos que tiene en su casa.

El sueño de María, es tener las fuerzas necesarias, para apoyar a su esposo en lo que pueda y disfrutar sus ultimos dias de vida.
texts.en:
María, 72 years old, didn't go to school because the school was very far away and her parents were very poor. She is married, her husband is a farmer and she weaves hammocks and bags. All of her children have their own homes.

When she was little, María learned how to weave hammocks and bags, since her parents worked in this way and when she got married she always had to work hard because she had several children to support. There was also a time when she helped her husband in his work planting corn but now he works alone growing the corn and beans to give them what they need.
