The loan will be used to purchase fertilizer such as manure and pesticides, since it is almost time to fertilize the cornfield, so the corn grows strong and has a good crop of corn. In this way she and her two grandchildren, who she has in the home, will be able to have a better quality of life.

María's dream is to have the strength necessary to support her husband in what she can, and to enjoy the last days of her life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure and pesticides for the cornfield.

loans.name: Grupo San Juan Pabayal 1 Group

texts.es:
Florinda  (es la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa color café claro) una mujer trabajadora, humilde y generosa que día a día se esmera en su trabajo para vivir mejor con sus hijos, ella cuenta que anterior mente su negocio de ropa típica contaba con muy poca mercadería y sus cliente eran muy pocos pero desde que tomó la iniciativa de solicitar un préstamo su vida ha cambiado mucho, pues ahora su negocio de venta de ropa típica ha mejorado porque ya cuenta con una variedad de colores estilos y precios de ropa, y sus clientes la buscan con más frecuencia, sus ganancias han mejorado y con ello la calidad de vida de su familia, pero ella no es una mujer conformista por lo que nuevamente junto a su grupo solicita un nuevo préstamo para realizar otra inversión es su negocio de ropa típica para satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Florinda y su grupo esperan contar con este crédito para  seguir prosperando para el bien de toda su familia. También anhela construirles una casa a sus hijos para que vivan mejor.
texts.en:
Florinda (the first from the left in the photograph with the light coffee-coloured blouse) is hard working, humble and generous. Every day she works hard in her job in order to have a better life with her children. She says that previously her traditional clothing business had very little merchandise and she had very few customers. However, since she took the initiative of applying for a loan her life has changed a lot. 

Now her traditional clothing business has improved because she has a variety of colours, styles and prices.  Her customers are more frequent, her earnings have improved and with it the quality of her family's life. However, she is not a women who stands still as she is again, along with her group, applying for a new loan in order to invest further in her traditional clothing business so she can better satisfy her clients' needs.

With this loan Florinda and her group hope to continue prospering for the good of all of her family.  She also hopes to build a house for her children in order to improve their lives.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Micaela

texts.es:
Micaela trabajar con entusiasmo y mucho esmero es su mayor secreto  para la elaboración de chocolates, ella tiene una hermosa familia de cinco hijos de las edades entre 15 y 29 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez, ella con la elaboración de chocolates a sobrevivido las necesidades de su amada familia pues con los años que tiene de experiencia tiene mucha clientela, ella ahora ha tomado la decisión de realizar la remodelación de su casa pues con el paso de los años la casa  ahora presenta algunos deterioros por lo que es muy necesario la remodelación por tal razón solicita un préstamo para poder cambiar las puertas, ventanas y pisos.
Micaela tiene el anhelo de que sus hijos tengan una casa más presentable para que vivan mejor.
texts.en:
Micaela works with enthusiasm and great care. It is her great secret in making chocolates. She has a beautiful family of five children with ages from 15 to 29. This humble family lives in a community of Suchitepéquez. By preparing chocolates, she has made ends meet in providing the necessities for her beloved family, since with her years of experience, she has many customers.

She has now made the decision to do some remodeling in her house, since with the passing of the years, the house now shows some deterioration. For this reason, the remodeling is very necessary, and Micaela is applying for a loan to be able to replace the doors, windows, and floors.

Micaela has the desire for her children to have a more presentable house so that they can live better.

loans.use: to buy doors, windows, and floors

loans.name: Nelson Jeovanny

texts.es: Nelson tiene de 30 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 9 y 3 años de edad. Nelson es un hombre muy trabajador que desde hace tiempo se dedica a al oficio de estructuras metálicas elaborando lo que son: polines, canales de agua, puertas, ventanas etc. además cuenta con una pequeña tienda de productos de primera necesidad que es atendida por su esposa en su casa de habitación y gracias a estas actividades obtiene los ingresos económicos necesarios para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Nelson con el propósito de mejorar su condición habitacional  desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que el que posee actualmente se encuentra en malas condiciones, por lo que ha decidido solicitar un crédito que le permita invertir en la compra de: lámina galvanizada y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Nelson is 30 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and their two children, ages 9 and 3. Nelson is a very hard-working man who for some time has worked making metal structures such as beams, gutters, doors, windows, etc. In addition, he has a small store with basic products which is tended by his wife in the house and, thanks to these activities, he gets the income necessary to be able to get his family ahead. Nelson, with the goal to improve his living conditions, wants to replace the roof on his home since the one he has now is in bad condition. So, he has decided to ask for a loan that will allow him to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheeting and nails to replace the roof on his house.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheeting and nails to replace the roof on his house.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de totopostes, hojaldras y rosquetes (panes elaborados con harina de maíz) se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 15 años y vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo ya que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Blanca, 32 years old, lives in her own house with her four children. She works making and selling totopostes, hojaldras and rosquetes (breads made from cornmeal). She has done this work for the past 15 yeas and she sells her products in the different markets that are near her house. She is asking for a loan to purchase corn in bulk to be able to continue with her work since it generates good earnings.

loans.use: to purchase corn in bulk.

loans.name: Sairahan

texts.ru: Сайрахан, 57 лет, она замужем, вырастила и дала достойное воспитание 5 детям, самому младшему - 23 года. У Сайрахан среднее образование, по характеру она очень ответственная, честная и трудолюбивая женщина. Сайрахан и ее супруг на пенсии, также они уже много лет занимаются животноводством и полеводством. В апреле 2015 года Сайрахан обращалась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом на покупку удобрений и рассады арбузов и дыни для выращивания, средства она использовала по назначению, погашает кредит вовремя. Однако в мае этого года случилось несчастье, из-за сильной грозы, ливневых дождей и сели пострадал 1,0 Га земли с уже принявшимися арбузами. Спасти урожай не удалось. Но у Сайрахан еще есть время удобрить землю, посадить новую рассаду и осенью получить хороший урожай. В хозяйстве также есть 2 коровы. Сайрахан вновь обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" уже за льготным кредитом "Форс-Мажор", ей требуется 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для восстановления почвы, урожая и выращивания экологически-чистых арбузов. Восстановление бизнеса позволит Сайрахан в будущем развить ее деятельность и накопить на свадьбу сына.
texts.en:
Sairahan is 57 years old. She is married, and has raised and given a good upbringing to 5 children, the youngest of which is 23 years old. Sairahan has a secondary education, and she is a very responsible, honest, and hard-working woman. Sairahan and her husband are on pensions, and they also have worked in animal husbandry and field husbandry for many years. 

In April 2015, Sairahan applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer, and melon and watermelon seedlings to grow. She used the funds as described, and has been paying back the loan on time. However, in May of this year, a misfortune occurred: 1.0 hectares of land, already planted with watermelon, were damaged by strong thunderstorms, pouring rain and mud flows. They did not manage to save the harvest.

However, Sairahan still has time to fertilize the soil, plant new seedlings, and have a good harvest in the fall. There are also 2 cows on her farm. Sairahan has reapplied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a reduced-rate "Force Majeure" loan. She needs 20,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer to rehabilitate the soil, and to grow and harvest organic watermelons. The recovery of her business will allow Sairahan to develop her business in the future, and to save money for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to restore her business after it was destroyed by heavy rainfall, by repurchasing fertilizers and organic watermelon seedlings.

loans.name: Rose Cory

texts.en:
Rose Cory is 26 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school.

Rose Cory is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Rose Cory requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

She has been raising pigs for eight years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to help sustain this business.

In the future, Rose Cory would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
Candelaria is 48 years old and married with six children. With two children in school, Candelaria works very hard to provide for them.

Candelaria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products, and assorted groceries.

Candelaria has been in this business for 9 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, beverages, biscuits, shampoo, eggs and other groceries. 

In the future, Candelaria would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products, and assorted groceries.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
María, de 45 años de edad, está casada, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, de los cuales dos estudian y los otros dos aún no van a la escuela.

María, tiene una venta de pupusas y platos típicos en su casa, a este trabajo se ha dedicado durante 4 años y es su principal fuente de ingresos.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar más materia prima y mobiliario para su negocio, porque está siendo muy rentable y la demanda es alta. 

María, sueña con que su negocio crezca y tener un local más amplio para que sus ventas sean mejores.
texts.en:
Maria, who is 45 years old, is married. She lives with her husband and their four children, of whom two go to school and the other two are not yet in school.

Maria has a business of selling pupusas [thick, filled corn tortillas] and traditional dishes in her home. She has done this work for four years, and it is her principal source of income.

She needs the loan to purchase more basic ingredients and furniture for her business, because it is very profitable and the demand is high.

Maria dreams of having her business grow and of having a bigger space so that her sales will be greater.

loans.use: to buy more basic ingredients and furniture for her business.

loans.name: Magadalena Ernestina

texts.es:
Magdalena, de 75 años de edad, es una señora muy trabajadora, tiene su negocio propio, está soltera y vive con su nieta que es quien le ayuda con el negocio.

Magdalena, tiene 15 años de tener una farmacia, esa fue la herencia que su esposo le dejó y ahí donde le ayuda su nieta.

Ella necesita que el crédito para invertir en más producto para la farmacia y poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

Magadalena, quiere seguir trabajando en su negocio mientras Dios le de vida.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 75 years old. She is a very hard-working woman who has her own business. She is single and lives with a granddaughter who helps her with the business.

Magdalena has had the pharmacy for 15 years. It was an inheritance from her husband and her granddaughter helps her there.

She needs a loan to invest in more product for her pharmacy and be able to satisfy the needs of her customers. Magadalena wants to continue to work in her business as long as God grants her life.

loans.use: to invest in more product for her pharmacy.

loans.name: Angela Elena

texts.es:
Ángela es una mujer con mucha dedicación y esmero que trabaja fuerte mente para el sustento de su familia, ella tiene 49 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de ocho hijos de las cuales únicamente viven con ella tres, Ángela para obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la venta de frutas desde hace dos años, ahora ella  se ve a la necesidad de comprar laminas para cambiar el techo de su casa que ya se encuentra en muy mal estado y ya se acerca la época de lluvia por lo que es muy necesario realizar este cambio pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es que no contar con el dinero suficiente por tal razón solicita un préstamo para poder cambiar el techo de la casa.
Ángela tiene las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para que sus hijos no sufran en esta época de lluvia.
texts.en:
Ángela is a strong minded woman who through a lot of dedication and care works to support her family. She is 49 years old, married, and has a beautiful family of 8 children of whom only 3 live with her.

In order to earn money Ángela has been selling fruit for 2 years. Now she sees the necessity of buying corrugated sheets in order to repair the roof of her home which is in poor condition. The rainy season is approaching so it is very necessary to make this change. One of the difficulties she has is that she doesn’t have sufficient funds which is why she is asking for a loan in order to replace the roof of her house.

Ángela is hoping to get a loan so that her children do not suffer during this rainy season.

loans.use: to buy corrugated sheets to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas y caballeros de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su casa tiene 7 años de dedicarse a esa actividad y gracias a sus ventas es como ha podido salir adelante, la joven es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: The young woman whose face has been pixelated because she is 26 years old and lives in a high risk area, works selling clothing for women and men as a street vendor through the various neighborhoods that are near her home. She has been doing this work for almost 7 years and, thanks to her sales, she has been able to get ahead. The young woman is a single mother who lives in her own house with her daughter. She is asking for a loan to purchase more clothing in bulk to continue with her work since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven  a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 6 años a la agricultura, al cultivo de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young man's face has been pixelated because he is 23 years old and lives in high-risk area. He has been working in agriculture for the last 6 years. He grows corn and sells his product at different markets near his home. He lives in his own home with his wife and two children. He is seeking a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, etc. and to improve the soil shown in the photograph so that he can continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, etc. and improve the soil.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica desde hace 17 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. así como muestra la fotografía y mejorar el terreno para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Fernando is 46 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has been in agriculture for 17 years and grows corn. When his crop is ready he sells it in the surrounding villages, he has many regular customers. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest controls, herbicides, etc. as the photograph shows. He wants to improve the land so he can continue growing crops, since this is his only source of income, and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc. and improve his land.

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es:
Amilcar tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge sin hijos, en casa propia de material rústico en el Caserío de HUARANGOPAMPA que se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de San Felipe, en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Amilcar se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo maíz amarillo duro, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de maíz así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Amilcar espera ofrecer un maíz de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Amilcar is 25 years old and lives with his wife and children in their own home made of basic materials in a small village named Huarangopampa, which is located in the San Felipe district, in Jaén province, in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this area is very peaceful and the inhabitants mainly work in agriculture, trade or cattle-rearing. 

Amilcar works in agriculture, specifically growing yellow corn. He has worked in this area for the past 10 years and has very good personal and professional references from the people who live there. He will use his loan to buy manure and fertilizer to be able to give the necessary maintenance to his corn plantation and to be able to hire workers for the harvest season. Amilcar hope to offer better quality corn to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his income and give him the means to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to give sufficient maintenance to his corn plantation.

loans.name: Julin

texts.en:
Julin is 43 years old and married with three children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to purchase more inventory of canned goods, egg, milk, sugar, etc.

Julin has been in this business for 11 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory of canned goods, egg, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Jennifer works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. Jennifer is borrowing PHP 6000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Jennifer has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Girlie

texts.en:
Girlie is 33 years old, married, and has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell.

Girlie has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy more product inventory to sell, such as noodles, soap, shampoo, eggs, milk, etc.

Elena is hardworking and industrious, and is able to earn some additional income through other business ventures, like buying and selling chicken feed and charcoal.

Elena dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more product inventory, such as noodles, soap, shampoo, eggs, milk, etc.

loans.name: Connie

texts.en:
Connie is 25 years old with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Connie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

Connie has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

In the future, Connie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es:
Maria es una joven con muchos sueños y metas en la vida pues ella apenas tiene 22 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en una comunidad del departamento de Sololá, Maria para poder adquirir sus ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa cuenta con una pequeña tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes este pequeño negocio lo tiene ella desde hace 7 años, Maria por ser una joven con muchos valores y muy amable mucha gente lo visita en su tienda, es por ello que desde hace algún tiempo  había pensado comprar más productos para surtir mejor su tienda pero no le había sido posible, pero ella con el afán de seguir prosperando solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en  su tienda de abarrotes y satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Maria sueña con poder mejorar su negocio para obtener mejores ingresos y construir una casa propia.
texts.en:
Maria is a young woman with many dreams and goals in life. She is barely 22 years old and lives with her parents in a community in the department of Sololá. María wants to be able to get income and support her parents with the household expenses. She has a small store where she buys and sells groceries. She has had this business for the past 7 years. Since María is a young woman with many values and is very friendly, many people come to her store. It is for this that, for some time, she has been thinking about purchasing more products to stock her store better, but this has not been possible. But, with the desire to continue prospering, she asks for a loan which she will invest in her grocery store and to better satisfy her customers' needs.

María dreams of being able to improve her business to get more income and build her own home.

loans.use: to purchase groceries.

loans.name: Eugenia Liliam

texts.es:
Eugenia es una madre de familia trabajadora, amable y muy sincera que se esmera día con día para darles lo mejor a sus dos hijos quienes tienen la edad de 9 y 13 años  y viven en una comunidad de del departamento  de Sololá, para Eugenia el que sus hijos cuenten con todo lo necesario es muy importante  es por ello que para obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la agricultura sembrando maíz esta labor lo realiza ella desde hace 15 años, Eugenia para seguir prosperando  decidió realizar un préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para el cultivo de maíz pues ya se acerca la época de lluvia y es muy importante cultivar a tiempo para poder adquirir una buena cosecha este año.
Eugenia tiene el anhelo de comprar un terreno para incrementar el cultivo de maíz y mejorar sus ingresos para que a su familia no le haga falta nada.
texts.en:
Eugenia is the hard-working mother of a family. She is friendly and very sincere and goes to a lot of effort day after day in order to give the best to her two children, who are 9 and 13 years old. They live in a community in the department of Sololá. For Eugenia it is very important that her children have everything that is necessary. It is for this reason that she works in agriculture, raising corn, in order to obtain her income. She has been doing this work for 15 years. 

In order to continue prospering, Eugenia decided to take out a loan to buy fertilizers and pay for labor for the corn crop, since the rainy season is coming, and it is very important to do the maintenance on time in order to acquire a good harvest this year.

Eugenia's dream is to buy a plot of land to increase her corn crop and improve her income so that her family won't lack for anything.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement and sand to repair the walls of her house and offer better security to her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheeting, beams and nails to replace the roof of his house and provide his daughter a better quality of life.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Para cristina trabajar en el campo no es ningún impedimento pues lo hace con el único fin de generar sus ingresos y mantener a sus seis hijos de las edades entre 16 y 1 año, ella vive en una comunidad del departamento de Sololá, cristina tiene diez años de trabajar en el campo y gracias a su esmero cosecha una variedad de verduras, para Cristina convivir con la naturaleza es una bendición pues de donde proviene el pan de cada día, es por ello que con el afán de seguir cultivando y mejorar sus ingresos ahora ha tomado la iniciativa de solicitar un préstamo para la  compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de zanahoria y papa pues ella aunque quisiera adquirir sus fertilizantes no le es posible , es por ello que guarda las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para que su cultivo reciba su mantenimiento necesario a tiempo.
El gran sueño de esta humilde mujer es construir una casa de terraza para que sus hijos tengan un mejor hogar donde puedan vivir mejor.
texts.en:
For Cristina, to work in the countryside is not an impediment because she does it with the only end of generating income and supporting her six children between the ages of 16 and 1. She lives in a community in the department of Sololá. Cristina has been working in the countryside for ten years and, thanks to her care, she harvests a variety of vegetables. For Cristina to live with nature is a blessing since that is where the daily bread comes from. It is for this that, with the desire to continue cultivating and to improve her income, she has now taken the initiative to ask for a loan to purchase fertilizers for the carrot and potato crops since, although she wanted to get her fertilizers, it was not possible. For this reason, she holds out the hope of getting the loan so that her crop gets the maintenance it needs on time.

This humble woman's great dream is to build a house with a patio so that her children have a better home where they can live better.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for the carrot and potato crops.

loans.name: Ana Delmis Yamileth

texts.es:
Ana, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato opción salud, pero nunca ha laborado en esa área, actualmente tiene tres hijos, de los cuales dos de ellos están estudiando y la menor es una niña de cuatro meses de nacida.

Ana, desde muy joven le gusto trabajar, cuando tenía 17 años de edad le ayudaba a su madre a vender carne de res en la comunidad, porque en su casa había destazo, actualmente su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y ella trabaja vendiendo carne de res, siempre sigue con el mismo negocio, ya que le ha dado muchas ganancias e ingresos a su familia.

El  crédito será invertido para comprar reces para destazar, ya que uno de sus hijos se le enfermo gravemente y se quedó sin fondos para trabajar, por esa razón es que necesita el dinero para seguir con sus labores.

El sueño de Ana, es que sus hijos se puedan preparar académicamente y que en un futuro sean profesionales y que su hijo se recupere de su enfermedad.
texts.en:
Ana, 34 years old, completed secondary school with a focus on health, but she has never worked in this area. Currently, she has three children, of whom two are students and the youngest one is a four-month-old girl. 

Since she was very young, Ana has liked to work. When she was 17 years old, she helped her mother sell beef in the community because they did the butchering in her house. Currently, her husband works in agriculture and she works selling beef. She has always continued with the same business, since it has given good earnings and income to her family. 

The loan will be invested in purchasing cattle to butcher, since one of her children was gravely ill and she was left without funds to work. For this reason, she needs the money to continue with her work. 

Ana's dream is that her children will be able to complete their schooling and, in the future, be professionals and that her son recovers from his illness.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to butcher.

loans.name: Degaan Group

texts.en:
Abdirashid is 24 years old. He teaches students at the Gollis University Faculty of Engineering. 

Abdirashid and two of his colleagues have established Degaan Aluminium, a company that makes glass windows and aluminum doors for new houses. They work closely with construction companies. When the construction company finishes building the house, then Degaan Aluminium makes the glass windows and aluminum doors that are needed, working on contract for the construction company. Degaan Almunium even makes custom glass windows for old houses in need of updated windows.

Abdirashid wants to buy more aluminum materials to make more glass windows so they requested a loan of $1500 dollars from Kaaba MfI. Abdirashid is the leader of the Degaan loan group, which consists three male members who are co-owners of Degaaan Aluminium. Abdirashid is the one raising his hand in the group photo. Kaaba will provide the needed goods as loans, and then Abdirashid and his group will repay through monthly installments.

loans.use: to buy more aluminum materials for making glass windows.

loans.name: Susana Beatriz

texts.es:
Susana, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en el ministerio de obras pública, solo tiene un hijo pero no vive con ella.

Susana, se dedica a vender pupusas en su comunidad, tiene más de 1 año de tener este negocio, aprendió todo el manejo de este negocio cuando era empleada en una pupusería.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar una plancha nueva para hacer pupusas.

Susana, siempre ha soñado con tener una pupuseria grande y en un local formal.
texts.en:
Susana, 26 years old, completed secondary school, is partnered and her partner works in the department of public works. She only has one child but he doesn't live with her.

Susana works selling pupusas in her community. She has had this business for more than 1 year. She learned all the management of this business when she was employed in a pupusa shop. 

The loan will be used to purchase a new griddle to make pupusas.

Susana has always dreamed of having a large pupusa shop and a formal retail space.

loans.use: to purchase a new griddle to make pupusas.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: Don Jose de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la venta de frijol, maíz y cal por quintales y libras, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, sal y frijoles por quintales para continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Jose is 59 years old. He lives in his own home with his family. 

He has been working for 30 years selling beans, corn, and lime by quintals and pounds. His business is located in his place of residence and he has many customers. With what he earns from the sales he is able to pay some of the household epenses. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy corn, salt and beans by quintals in order to continue with his sales and thus be able to have better financial earnings.

loans.use: to buy corn, salt, and beans by quintals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm sprayers to apply fertilizer.

loans.name: Enecita

texts.en:
Enecita is 61 years old and is married with seven children. She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Enecita requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Enecita has been raising pigs for 39 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain this livelihood.

In the future, Enecita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Ángel Maria

texts.es:
Ángel, de 38 años de edad, no estudio, está acompañada y tiene dos hijos, de los cuales uno de ellos está estudiando bachillerato y el otro está estudiando educación básica.

Ángel, desde que era una niña trabaja en la agricultura junto con sus hermanos, pero luego se acompañó y su pareja le ayudo económicamente a poner un pequeño negocio de comida, el cual posee desde hace 10 años en el mercado de su pueblo.

El dinero de este crédito será invertido para comprar utensilios de cocina como planto, cacerolas, cucharas, tenedores, entre otras cosas para mejorar su comedor.

Los sueños de Ángel, son mejorar su negocio para poder pagar los estudios de sus dos hijos, ya que su esposo ya no le puede ayudar, porque tiene muchas enfermedades que le impiden trabajar.
texts.en:
Ángel, 38 years old, didn't go to school. She is partnered and has two children, of whom one is in secondary school and the other is in primary school.

Ángel has worked in agriculture with her siblings since she was a girl. But, later she became partnered and her partner helped her economically to establish a small food business, which she has had for 10 years in the market in her town. 

The money from this loan will be invested in purchasing kitchen utensils such as plates, pots, spoons, forks, and other things to improve her restaurant.

Ángel's dream is to improve her business to be able to pay for her two children's education, since her partner can't help her anymore because he has many illnesses that prevent him from working.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils such as plates, pots, spoons, forks, and other things to improve her restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw material to make clothing.

loans.name: Yajaira Lisseth

texts.es:
Yajaira, de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada, su esposo se dedica a trabajar de albañil, tiene un hijo de un mes de nacido.

Yajaira, tiene 5 años de dedicarse a la siembra de granos básicos, el trabajo lo aprendió con sus padres, ya que ellos eso hacían para poder sacar a su familia adelante, la parcela donde siembran está a 15 minutos de su casa.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar los insumos necesarios para sembrar maíz y ajonjolí.

Yajaira, siempre a soñado con tener una casa propia, ya que donde vive es de su madre.
texts.en:
Yajaira, 22 years old, went to school until the 9th grade. She is in a relationship and her husband works as a bricklayer. She has a one month-old child. 

Yajaira has been planting basic grains for five years. She learned this work from her parents, it is the work they did to raise their family. The land where Yajaira plants is 15 minutes from her home. 

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy necessary supplies to plant corn and sesame. Yajaira has always dreamed of having her own home since where she currently lives belongs to her mother.

loans.use: to buy necessary supplies to plant corn and sesame.

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: Maria tiene 40 años, es una madre soltera que trabaja muy arduamente para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos que aun están estudiando. Ella se dedica a trabajos múltiples pero principalmente a la cría de animales de granja, ella apuesta por los animales vacunos orgánicos, dado que vende su leche y carne a un mejor precio. En el futuro espera poder darles a sus hijos estabilidad económica y las necesidades básicas que necesita, su mayor anhelo es que dentro de unos años pueda ver a sus hijos como unos profesionales.
texts.en: Maria is 40 years old. She is a single mother who works hard to get her 3 children ahead. They are still in school. She has multiple jobs but mainly she raises farm animals. She is going to invest in organic cattle, because she can sell their milk and meat at a better price. In the future, she hopes to give her kids financial stability and their basic needs. Her biggest wish is that in a few years, she can see her children graduate from college.

loans.use: to buy a small organic cow.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la venta de sorbetes y paletas desde hace 7 años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes por ser un producto muy vendible, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas paletas y sorbetes por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas.
texts.en: Juan, 38 years old, lives in his own house with his three children. He has worked selling sorbets and popsicles for the past 7 years. His business is located in his home and he has many customers because it is a very sellable product. He is asking for a loan to purchase more popsicles and sorbets in bulk to be able to continue with his sales.

loans.use: to purchase popsicles and sorbets in bulk.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es: Pedro tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 20 y 18 años de edad. Pedro se dedica a prestar sus servicios de seguridad desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento diario  a su hogar. Pedro con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el  cambio de una buena parte del techo de su vivienda que se encuentra dañado y en épocas de lluvia presenta filtraciones de agua que ponen en  riesgo sus pertenencias materiales  y la salud de su familia, espera que con el monto solicitado comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para reparar el techo de su vivienda y de esta forma dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Pedro is 47 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and their two children, ages 20 and 18. Pedro has worked as a security guard for a long time and it is in this way that he earns a living and brings daily sustenance to his household. Pedro, with the desire to improve his living conditions, asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in replacing a good part of the roof on his house which is damaged and, in the rainy season, leaks water putting his material possessions and his family's health at risk. He hopes, with the amount requested, to purchase galvanized metal sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof on his house and in this way give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof on his house and, in this way, give his family better living conditions.

loans.name: Zoila Ericka

texts.es: Zoila de 24 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de verduras y legumbres, dicha actividad la realiza de forma ambulante recorriendo las calles del mercado municipal y sus alrededores, lo que le permite llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Zoila habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 6 y 3 años de edad desde hace varios años. Zoila desea invertir en verduras y legumbres por mayoreo, ya que sabe que de esta manera sus ingresos serán mejores, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: tomates, güisquiles, cebollas, hierba buena, espinaca, chipilín, loroco, etc. para vender de forma ambulante.
texts.en: Zoila, 24 years old, is an enterprising woman who, 2 years ago, decided to sell vegetables. She does this work as a street vendor, going through the streets of the municipal market and the nearby areas, which allows her to bring daily sustenance to her home. Zoila has lived in her own house with husband and their two children, ages 6 and 3, for some years. Zoila wants to invest in vegetables in bulk, since she knows that in this way her income will be greater. So, she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in tomatoes, chayote squash, onions, mint, spinach, chipilín, green pepper, etc. to sell as a street vendor.

loans.use: to invest in tomatoes, chayote squash, onions, mint, spinach, chipilín, green pepper, etc. to sell as a street vendor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine to use for more income.

loans.name: Vilma Haydee

texts.es: Vilma tiene una edad de 32 años, es madre soltera y vive junto a sus 3 hijos de 15, 13 y 5 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Vilma es una mujer trabajadora y muy organizada que se dedica a vender prendas de vestir en las comunidades de los alrededores  a su vivienda durante los primeros tres días de la semana, y los días restantes se dedica a vender platillos típicos en su casa de habitación, es de esta manera como ella obtiene los ingresos que le permiten llevar el pan de cada día hasta su hogar. Vilma hace algún tiempo comenzó la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio pero debido a problemas económicos no pudo terminar la obra es por ello que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina, polines, puertas y ventanas para de esta forma terminar el cuarto dormitorio y brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma is 32 years old. She is a single mother and lives with her three children, ages 15, 13, and 5, who attend school. Vilma is a hard-working and very organized woman who sells articles of clothing in the communities surrounding her home during the first three days of the week. On the remaining days, she sells traditional dishes in her home. It is in this way that she obtains the income that allows her to provide the daily bread for her household.

Some time ago Vilma began the construction of a bedroom, but due to economic problems, she was not able to finish the work. It is for this reason that she has decided to apply to FUSAI for a loan in order to buy metal sheeting, purlins, doors, and windows, so that in this way she can finish the bedroom and offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, purlins, doors, and windows so that in this way she can finish the bedroom and offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 36 years old, married to Isabella and supports a family of 5 children. He has been practicing dairy farming for the last 13 years earning KES 12,500 per month.

Samuel has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy an additional dairy cow to have surplus milk production to sell.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to buy land for rental construction.

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable with large rental estates.

loans.use: to buy an additional dairy cow for milk production and sales.

loans.name: Frisca

texts.en:
Frisca is a married woman with three children. Frisca is 46 years old and two of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Frisca has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 16 years. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in the market.

In the future, Frisca would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in the market.

loans.name: Sotero

texts.es:
Sotero, de 58 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudiando, está casado y tiene dos hijos, pero todos trabajan y viven aparte, su esposa se dedica al los oficios de la casa.

Sotero, es agricultor desde hace 20 años, aprendió este trabajo con su padre; antes era ganadero, ahora su trabajo está a 1 kilómetro de distancia desde su casa y sus hijos se involucran en el trabajo desde las 6:00 a.m. a las 11:00 a.m. 

Sotero, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes, con el préstamo podrá tener los insumos para preparar la tierra a tiempo.

Sus sueños son comprar una vaca y que sus hijos aprendan bien el trabajo agrícola.
texts.en:
Sotero is 58 years old. He didn't have the opportunity to continue in school. He is married and has two children, but they work and live apart from him. His wife takes care of the home.

Sotero has been a farmer 20 years. He learned this work from his father. He was a rancher before. Now his work is 1 kilometer from his house and his children are involved in the work from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. 

Sotero needs the loan to buy compost, pesticide, and fertilizer. With the loan, he will be able to prepare the soil on time. 

Her dreams are to buy a cow and for her children to lean farm work well.

loans.use: to buy compost, pesticide and fertilizer.

loans.name: Robiyamoi

texts.ru: Девушку на фотографии зовут Робиямои. Она добрая и гостеприимная. Ей 24 года. Она замужем и имеет маленький ребенок. Робиямои вместе свекровью, тестю, мужем и ребенком  проживает в городе Куляб. Муж занимается таксистом. Робиямои большую часть своей жизни проводит с ребенком и занимаясь домашними делами. Но она на все успевает, и находит время и для шитья. Робиямои  принимается заказы на шитье женской одежды около 4 года. Сейчас чтобы продолжить швейную деятельность Робиямои необходимо купить другую новую швейную машинку. Она хочет купить современную электрическую швейную  машинку. Новая машинка ускорит процесс работы и повлияет на качество шитья. Робиямои нуждается на поддержку. Поддержите ее!
texts.en: The young lady in the photograph is called Robiyamoi. She is kind and hospitable. She is 24 years old. She is married and has a small child. Robiyamoi lives with her mother-in-law, father-in-law, husband and child in the town of Kulob. Her husband is a taxi driver. Robiyamoi spends most of her time with her child and on domestic work. But she manages to do everything, and even finds time for sewing. Robiyamoi has been taking orders for sewing women's clothes for about four years. Now, in order to continue her sewing business, Robiyamoi must buy a different, new sewing machine. She wants to buy a modern electric sewing machine. A new sewing machine will speed up the process of her work and will influence the quality of her sewing. Robiyamoi needs support. Please support her!

loans.use: to buy a modern electric sewing machine.

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en:
Gertrudes, 51, is married and has three children, one in school.

Gertrudes is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for 16 years and has borrowed 12 times from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to sustain her business.

She has now requested a loan of 15,000 Philippine pesos through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies for raising her livestock.

In the future, Gertrudes would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies for raising her livestock

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela, 56, is married with eight children. She runs an agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year and earns additional income from food vending.

Estela is borrowing 10,000 Philippine pesos through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies for raising her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies for raising her pigs

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel un hombre que se dedica día con día al trabajo para darle lo mejor a sus hijos, se encuentra muy satisfecho porque gracias al crédito él pudo comprar sus materiales y logro construir su casa, él cuenta que antes de haber tenido acceso a los créditos  para él era muy difícil empezar la construcción pero ahora afortunadamente ya cuenta con una casa, pero Gabriel con el afán de seguir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar más materiales de construcción para la próxima construcción de un cuatro para sus hijos.
Gabriel espera contar nuevamente con el préstamo para ser posible esta nueva construcción y seguirle brindando a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gabriel is a man who works day to day to give his children the best. He is very satisfied because thanks to the loan, he was able to purchase his materials and managed to build his house. He says that before having access to the loans, it was very difficult for him to begin construction but now he is lucky to have a house. But, with the desire to continue improving his family's quality of life, Gabriel asks for another loan to be able to purchase more construction material for the upcoming construction of a room for his children.

Gabriel hopes to have the loan again so that this new construction is possible and to continue offering his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Para las mujeres trabajadoras, esmeradas y muy dedicadas es una bendición contar con la sabiduría de poder combinar los colores y elaborar hermosos trajes típicos,  una de estas grandes artesanas es Lucia que día con día se esmera por elaborar los coloridos trajes de su comunidad, ella tiene 10 años de realizar esta labor ella lo hace con el único fin de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a sus tres hijos quienes aún viven bajo su cuidado, para Lucia ofrecerle a sus clientes una serie de blusas de distintos colores y estilos es su mayor anhelo por lo que ahora solicita un préstamo para poder comprar hilos de distintos colores y marcas para elaborar lindos trajes de su región y venderlas  a un buen precio.
Lucia guarda las esperanzas de poder contar con un local donde pueda exhibir mejor sus productos y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
For working women who are conscientious and very dedicated, it is a blessing to have the wisdom to be able to combine colors and make beautiful traditional clothing. Lucia is one of these great artisans who day by day takes great pains to make the colorful outfits of her community. She has done this work for 10 years. She does it with the only end of getting an income and getting her three children ahead, who still live under her care. For Lucia, to offer her customers a series of louses of different colors and styles is her greatest desire so now she is asking for a loan to be able to purchase thread of different colors and brands to make beautiful outfits from her region and sell them at a good price.

Lucia holds onto the hope of being able to have a retail space where she can show her products better and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase thread to make traditional clothing.

loans.name: Calixto

texts.es:
Para Calixto trabajar y superarse con el sudor de la frente es lo más importante es por ello que lucha día con día en el campo, él cuenta que gracias al crédito anterior sus cultivo ha incrementado mucho y su ingresos han mejorado  pues el ahora ya cuenta con más terrenos donde cultivar, Calixto espera seguir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia, pero también anhela seguir creciendo como agricultor es por ello que solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar semillas de cebolla y abono químico para sembrar en esta temporada de producción de cebolla.
Calixto guarda las esperanzas de que contara nuevamente con el crédito para poder  sembrar y mejorar sus ingresos para poder comprar más terrenos e incrementar su cultivo.
texts.en:
For Calixto, to work and better himself by the sweat of his brow is the most important thing. It is for this reason that he strives day after day in the field. He says that thanks to the previous loan, his crop has increased a lot and his income has improved, since he now has more land to cultivate. Calixto hopes to continue improving the living conditions of his family, but he also want to continue growing as a farmer. It is for this reason that he is applying for a new loan to be able to buy onion seeds and chemical fertilizer so that he can plant for this season's onion production.

Calixto has hope that he can have another loan to be able to plant and improve his income so that he can buy more land and increase his crop.

loans.use: to buy onion seeds and chemical fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some cattle and begin a new animal rearing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to supply milk in the area, which he will deliver on his motorcycle, for more income.

loans.name: Jojie

texts.en:
Jojie is 33 years old with two children. With both children in school, Jojie works very hard to provide for them.

Jojie runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of groceries, such as rice, sugar and soap. 

She has requested a loan of 7,000 Philippine pesos through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy items to sell, such as eggs, condiments and home products.

In the future, Jojie would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, such as eggs, condiments and home products.

loans.name: Rodo

texts.en: Rodo is 43 years old. He is married and the couple have two kids. Rodo has his own house. He is still working as a driver, and his wife works as a mason assistant at this time. Rodo needs another loan to build a room in his house. As you can see in the picture, Rodo and his wife have a humble house and it needs a lot of construction work, so he hopes you can help him. He is building the house step by step because he doesn't have the money to finish it quickly.

loans.use: to build a room in his house

loans.name: Mary Christine

texts.en:
Mary Christine is a 43-year-old married woman with one child.

Mary Christine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional grocery items to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, shampoo, and other personal care products.

Mary Christine has previously borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWT. She has been running her general store for 7 years, and also earns income from raising pigs.

Mary Christine aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use:
to purchase additional grocery items to sell,  such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, and other 
personal care products

loans.name: Ana Adelayda

texts.es:
Ana, de 27 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene 2 hijos, vive junto con su compañero de vida, sus hijos y sus hermanas, en la casa que sus padres le han dado para que vivan, su pareja se dedica a trabajar en la tierra y en la albañilería.

Ana, se dedica a colaborar junto a su pareja en las tareas del campo, ayudándole desde muy temprano en el trabajo de la tierra, ya que es de esto que obtienen los granos para estar abastecidos todo el año.

Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar abono, pesticidas y otros productos necesarios para la actividad productiva del campo, ya que han empezado a caer las primeras lluvias.

Ana, quiere que sus hijos vayan a la escuela, para que tengan más oportunidades de trabajo y éxito en la vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 27 years old, is married, and has 2 children. She lives together with her life partner, her children, and her sisters in her parents' house that they have given them to live in. Her partner works on the farm and in masonry.

Ana earns a living working together with her husband on the farm chores. She helps him starting very early in the morning since by doing this they can obtain a grain supply for the whole year.

She is requesting a loan to buy compost, pesticides, and other necessary items for productive farm work since the first rains have already started to fall.

Ana wants her children to go to school so they can have more work opportunities and success in life.

loans.use: to buy compost, pesticides, and other necessary items for productive farm work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a cow shed, as well as buying feed for his cows

loans.name: Myrla

texts.en:
Myrla is a 38-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are in school.

Myrla is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 25,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

She has been farming vegetables for ten years, and Myria has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF.

In the future, Myrla would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es: Nidia  tiene la edad  de 39 años, está casada y vive con el esposo  y dos hijos actualmente. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.  Es el segundo  préstamo que a recibido de FUDECOSUR. Élla no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado los préstamos con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Nidia is 39 years old. She is married, and currently lives with her husband and two children. With her loan she intends to buy fertilizers, fungicides, and pay for manual labor to help her with the coffee plants. With these improvements she hopes to obtain some earnings, and thus improve her family's living conditions.

This is the second loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had a loan from the State banks before and FUDECOSUR has provided her the loan with better terms and much lower rates of interest.

loans.use: to buy supplies for coffee plants.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 36 years old, married to Anne, and supports a family of 4 children. He has been practicing large scale farming for the last 9 years, earning 21,500 KES per month. 

Peter has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from Vision Fund Kenya, to buy a dairy cow to produce more milk and increase his income. He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children, and to buy land for rental construction. 

Peter's future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable, and have large rental estates.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow in order to produce more milk, and increase his income

loans.name: Carmela

texts.en:
Carmela is 41 years old and married, with two children, one of whom is in school.

Carmela is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Carmela requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Carmela has been farming vegetables for seven years now, and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Carmela would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 33 years old and married.  He supports a family with 2 children. 

He has been operating in motorcycle transport for the last 3 years, earning KES 9,000 per month.

Charles has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy spare parts for maintaining his motorcycle for efficient transport for more income gain. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to buy a vehicle for transport. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for maintaining his motorcycle.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick, aged 65 years, is married to Mary and supports 5 children. 

He is a small-scale farmer. He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to improve his farming activity through the purchase of certified seeds and fertilizers. 

He plans to use his gained profits to repay his loan and expand his farming activity. 

His hope is to improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to improve his farming activity through the purchase of certified seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease land in order to expand his farming activity

loans.name: Rodelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Rodelyn works hard to support her family. She has a business selling rice in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and charcoal.  Rodelyn is borrowing 17,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of different varieties of rice to sell for her business.

Rodelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of different varieties of rice to sell

loans.name: Helen May

texts.en:
Helen May is 21 years old, married with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Helen May has a fishing business in the Philippines. Helen May requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Helen May has been in this business for three years. In the future, Helen May would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with one child.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like rice retailing.

Lilian dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is a hard-working woman entrepreneur with two children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Marlyn dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Jellyn

texts.en:
Jellyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jellyn is 32 years old and has two children who are in school.

Jellyn has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. Jellyn requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more dried fish to sell.

Jellyn has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jellyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Bacilio

texts.es:
Bacilio tiene 41 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus seis menores hijos, en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Bacilio se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi),además de desempeñarse como peón agrícola, actividad que realiza desde varios años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Bacilio espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Bacilio, 41, is in a common law marriage, lives with his spouse and their 6 underage children. They live in the Pucará district in the Jaén, province in the  Cajamarca region in the northern coast of Peru.

Life in the community is calm. The citizens work mostly in commerce and small livestock. 

Bacilio earns a living by transporting passengers in his motorcycle taxi as well as working as a farm laborer, which he has done for several years. He has good experience in this field and has very good personal and professional references from the area. 

The loan will be used for repairs and maintenance of his vehicle as it is currently in bad shape. 

Bacilio hopes to offer a better service to his clients which will generate more income allowing him to improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: for repairs and maintenance of his vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to supply milk in the area and increase his income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk in the area with his motorcycle for more income.

loans.name: Zinat

texts.en:
Zinat is a 43-year-old married mother of three. Six years ago, she started selling clothes to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family. She suffered from a lot of troubles when she first started her business, but with her ambition and hard work, she succeeded in gaining a good reputation among her customers.

Zinat is trying desperately to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her merchandise with new collection of summer clothes to satisfy her customers' needs for the upcoming Fitr feast (end of holy Ramadan month).

Zinat hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of summer clothes for the upcoming Fitr feast

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.en:
Marcelino comes from the province of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. He is happily married to Ma. Teresita, her business partner. They work together to earn a living and be able to send their High School and Elementary children to school and provide for their daily sustenance.

Marcelino has a strong entrepreneurial spirit. Aside from being a franchisee of waffles he recently opened a small eatery that serves mainly "bulalo"(Filipino stew made from beef shanks and marrow bones boiled with corn cob), a favorite among the Filipinos and a perfect cold weather food. He also serves "pansit" (noodle dish cooked with veggies and meat) commonly served at birthday celebrations which represent long life and good health so they are not cut short so as not to oppose the symbolism. He is happy with the good turnout of his customers in his community. 

To help him sustain his business he is requesting for a Php 50,000 loan to buy several kilos of fresh beef shank, vegetables like corn and cabbage, noodles and various veggies, seasonings, gas to cook his special "bulalo" and "pansit" to serve at his restaurant.  He will be very grateful and is thanking you in advance for the financial assistance that will be extended to him. It will be a big help to increase his business and thus fund their daily sustenance and assist in his children's education.

Marcelino prays that God will continue to bless his family and businesses. He aims to send his two children to College. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for fresh meat such as beef shanks and vegetable to cook "bulalo" , noodles, veggies to cook pansit.

loans.name: Peregrina

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Peregrina works hard to support her family.

She has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Peregrina is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell for her coconut wine vending business.

Peregrina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Gennie

texts.en:
Gennie is 46 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by raising boar in the Philippines. Gennie is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF to purchase additional feeds and vitamins for her boar.

Gennie has been raising boar for 5 years and also earns additional income from fishing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional feeds and vitamins for her boar

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Michelle is 32 years old and has three children who are in school.

Michelle has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. Michelle requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials like fishing nets, gasoline, etc. for her business.

Michelle has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, Michelle would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fishing nets, gasoline, etc. for her business

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to purchase additional sack of rice to sell for her rice retailing business.

Salvacion has been in this business for 6 years. Salvacion earns more income from a general store.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita madre de familia trabajadora, con muchos sueños y metas ella ama y protege mucho a su familia pues cuida de sus cinco hijos de las edades entre 17 y 23 años, ya para darles lo mejor se dedica  a la compra y venta  de pescado seco, este pequeño negocio lo tiene ella desde hace tres años, pero también vende productos de canasta básica como frijoles  maíz entre otros.  Margarita con el afán de brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida ha tomado la iniciativa de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar sus materiales de construcción para construir una casa más cómoda para ellos, porque hasta estos días ellos viven en un lugar muy estrecho.
Margarita tiene las esperanzas de contar con el crédito para que sus hijos tengan una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Margarita is the mother of a working family with lots of dreams and goals. She loves and protects her family; she cares for her five children with ages between 17 and 23 years old. In order to give them the best, she works buying and selling dry fish. She has had this business for three years, and she also sells basic food items like beans, corn, and other items.

With the desire to bring her children a better quality of life, Margarita has taken the initiative to request a loan to buy construction materials to build a more comfortable house for them. Up to now, they live in a very cramped space.

Margarita hopes she can obtain the loan so her children can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is 62 years old and has three children.

Salvacion is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Salvacion requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies for raising her livestock.

Salvacion has been raising pigs for 12 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Salvacion would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies for raising her livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as fertilizer and seeds for use on his farm so as to get more farm produce to sell and make more income to support his family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk in the area to gain more income.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy soft drinks, cakes, snacks and vegetables

loans.name: Marcia

texts.en:
Marcia would like you to know that she so appreciates the previous loan that was granted to her, which helped improve her business. Although there were some challenges in collecting her receivables she is still encouraged by the good turnout of her sales as it really provides for the educational expenses of her children and meeting their daily needs.

She is hopeful that she can still request a PHP 10,000 loan to buy more frozen processed meat of a greater variety such as marinated pork and beef, hot dogs, bacon, rice and charcoal as well as to fill the regular orders of her customers. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial aid and for your good heart. Her earnings will surely help cover their daily needs and fund her children's schooling.

Marcia's simple dream is to send both of her children to college and to see them become professionals someday. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for frozen processed foods, rice and charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Emely

texts.en:
Emely is 33 years old and has four children. She is married and all four children are in school.

Emely is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Emely requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She has been raising pigs for ten years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Emely would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Arbel

texts.en:
Arbel is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Arbel is 38-years-old and has one child who is still in school.

Arbel has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Arbel requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy assorted fish to sell in her food stall.

Arbel has been in this business for 8 years. She would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy assorted fish to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a woman who is 50 years old. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Victoria has a food vending business in the Philippines. Victoria requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Victoria has been in this business for 30 years. In the future, Victoria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Shohzoda

texts.ru: На фотографии Шохзода и ее мама. Шохзода работает учительницей в средней школе. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Ее мама пенсионерка и на данный момент болеет. Несколько лет назад ее маме делали операцию, и оказалось, что ее нужно оперировать снова. У Шохзода не смогла собрать денег на такую операцию и обратилась за кредитом. Поддержите Шахзоду и ее маму.
texts.en: This photograph shows Shohzoda and her mother.  Shohzoda works as a teacher at the local high school and her husband is working abroad in Russia.  Her mother is retired and has fallen ill - several years ago her mother had an operation, and it turns out that she now needs an additional operation.
