Shohzoda couldn't gather enough money for the operation and has thus requested a loan.  Please support Shohzoda and her mother.

loans.use: to pay for her mother's operation

loans.name: Nashastamo

texts.ru: Нашастамо 53 лет. Она из городка Куляб. Нашастамо живет вместе сыном и невесткой. Сын честный ответственный человек. Он 5 лет занимается водителем грузового автомобиля. Ее сын перевозит крупных товаров. Невестка добрая, шустрая и активная девушка. Она 4 года дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. У невестке имеется много клиенты. Ее невестка в день шьет 2-3 платья, на старом машинке. Невестке нужна новая современная швейная машинка, чтобы расширить деятельность. И Нашастамо решила взять кредит и купить невестке швейную машинку. Она нуждается на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Nashastamo is 53 years old and is from the town of Kulob.  Nashastamo lives with her son and daughter-in-law.  Her son is an honest and responsible person, and has been working as a truck driver for 5 years transporting large goods.  Her daughter-in-law is a kind, bright, active young woman.  She has been sewing women's clothing from home for the past 4 years, and has many clients.  Her daughter-in-law sews 2-3 dresses per day on an old sewing machine.  Her daughter-in-law needs a new, modern sewing machine to expand her business.  Nashastamo decided to request a loan in order to purchase her daughter-in-law a sewing machine.  She needs your support.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 27-year-old married man from Dier El balah city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income is barely covers all the family needs.   He took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. 

This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Ibrahim will be able to decrease his electricity expenses. 
Ibrahim appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Abigirl

texts.en:
Abigail is 38 years old, married with three children and lives in the Chikomba District, Zimbabwe.  Abigail rents a small stall at the local flea market where she sells products such as bags, shoes, jeans, shirts, skirts, track suits, and t-shirts. She has been running this business for one year and it has enabled her to support her family. She repaid her $500 loan well. Now she  hopes to get a second Kiva loan so that she expand into hardware.

Abigail actively supports schools in her community by volunteering as a janitor. She strives to promote a healthy learning environment as she knows that it has a great impact on the way children learn.  She also volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide in schools to improve the well-being of students

loans.use: To purchase more cement, door frames and general hardware for her stall

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is 50 years old and married with one child. Juanita works very hard to provide for them.

Juanita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items of groceries to sell suh as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, shampoo and other personal care products.

Juanita has been in this business for 15 years. 

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items of groceries to sell suh as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, shampoo and other personal care products

loans.name: Jacob

texts.en:
Jacob is aged 30 years old, married and blessed with 2 children. He has a retail shop and has been running it for the last 2 years.
 
This is his first loan from VisionFund Kenya and he will use it to buy more stock of flour, rice, milk, cooking oil and milk for sell so as to serve more customers and make more income to support his family. He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and repay the loan. His future hopes are to expand his retail shop and open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy more stock of flour, rice, milk, cooking oil and milk for sell so as to serve more customers and make more income to support his family.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Riza works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store.  Riza is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF to buy materials for her business like bamboo, fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials.

Riza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business like bamboo, fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials

loans.name: Tagaymurod

texts.ru:
Тагаймурод веселый житель из славного района под названием Хуросон. Он счастливый отец двоих детей. У него мальчик и девочка. Тагаймуроту 28 лет. Он работает в сфере торговли. Тагаймурот имеет прилавку на базаре и торгует арбузами, фруктами и овощами. Он любит свою работу и наслаждается каждым днем своей жизни. Его можно назвать самым позитивным продавцом на рынке. Мимо его улыбки невозможно пройти мимо и хочется что-нибудь купить. Тагаймурот каждого своего клиента провожает с хорошим настроением и ослепительной улыбкой.
  Тагаймурот решил привести больше арбузов на продажу, так как сейчас самый сезон продаж арбузов и дыни. Его капитал не позволяют ему самостоятельно решить эту проблему, и он возлагается на заемные средства. Тагаймурот привезет арбузов и тем самым привлечет к себе большое количество клиентов. Он надеется, что его план осуществится благодаря Вам и заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Tagaymurod is a cheerful resident of the renowned region of Khuroson.  He is the happy father of two children - a son and a daughter.  Tagaymurod is 28 years old and works as a salesman.  Tagaymurod has a counter at the local market at which he sells watermelon, fruits, and vegetables.  He loves his work and enjoys every day of his life.  You could call him the most positive salesman at the market.  It is impossible to walk by his smile and not want to purchase something.  Tagaymurod sends each of his clients off with a good mood and a dazzling smile.  Tagaymurod decided to purchase more watermelons to sell because this is the watermelon and melon season.  His capital does not allow him to solve his problem on his own, and so he needs to rely on borrowed funds.  Tagayrumod will bring watermelons and in this way will attract a large number of clients.  He hopes that, thanks to you, his plan will be realized, and expresses his gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to purchase watermelons

loans.name: Navruz

texts.ru: Навруз вместе с семьей живет в городе Куляб. Ему 30 лет. Он женат и имеет детей. Навруз как и многие жители республики занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Этим видом деятельности он занят более 15 лет. В работе на земле в основном помогает брат.  Навруз имеет не большую часть земли, где он выращивает овощи. Он готовиться к посеву нового урожая и по этой причине он обратилась за кредитом. Сейчас главная его цель вспашка земли и обработать землю минеральными удобрениями. Для вспашки земли и купли минеральных удобрений у него не хватает денежных средств. Навруз  надеется на Вашу помощь и считает, что с Вашей помощью он сможет закончить посев и на следующий сезон собрать богатый урожай.
texts.en: Navruz and his family live together in the town of Kulob.  He is 30 years old, married, and has children.  Navruz, like many of the people in the republic, works in agriculture.  He has been working in this business for more than 15 years.  Navruz's brother helps him to work the land.  Navruz has a small plot of land on which he raises vegetables.  He is preparing for the new planting and for this reason is seeking a loan.  Right now his number one goal is is to plow and cultivate the land with mineral fertilizers.  He lacks sufficient funds to plow and purchase mineral fertilizers.  Navruz is depending on your help and believes, that with your help he can finish the planting and in the next season have a rich harvest.

loans.use: to plow and cultivate his land with mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Agée de 35 ans, Amélé  est une femme mariée vivant dans le quartier de Baguida avec ses deux enfants à sa charge. Amélé est très dynamique et vend du charbon de bois dans le quartier afin de procurer un bénéfice nécessaire pour venir en aide aux besoins de la famille. Amélé s’approvisionne six fois par mois au marché. Amélé demande ce crédit pour commander quelques sacs de charbons de bois pour vendre et gagner encore plus de revenus pour soutenir l’épanouissement de ses enfants.
texts.en: Amélé, aged 35, is a married woman living in the  Baguida district with her two children she supports. She is very energetic and sells charcoal in the district to procure a profit necessary to help meet family expenses. She gets her supplies six times a month at the market. Amélé is asking for this loan to order a few sacks of charcoal to sell and to earn still more revenue in order for her children to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase 3 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Assiaba

texts.fr: Assiaba vit à Baguida et est âgée de 60 ans. Assiaba est une femme mariée et mère de cinq enfants.  Assiaba vend de la bouillie préparée à base du maïs dans le quartier et trouve son gain grâce à son dynamisme. Assiaba s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter quelque sac  de maïs, Assiaba demande ce crédit pour réaliser son achat et tirer le profit nécessaire pour aider son mari dans les diverses charges de la famille.
texts.en: Assiaba lives in Baguida and is 60 years old. She is a married mother of five children and sells cornmeal porridge in the district. She makes a profit thanks to her dynamism. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. To purchase a few sacks of corn, Assiaba is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and make a profit necessary for helping out her husband in covering the family’s diverse expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Demeurant à Baguida, Akouvi est une femme mariée âgée de 33 ans. Responsable de trois enfants, Akouvi est une revendeuse de pate bandée préparée à base du maïs et gagne son revenu journalier grâce à cette activité. Akouvi s’approvisionne une fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs, Akouvi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et tirer un revenu favorable pour l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en: Akouvi, living in Baguida, is a married woman, 33 years old, and responsible for three children. She is a retailer of pate bandée, made from corn. Thanks to this business, she earns a daily income. She gets her supplies once a month from her suppliers. To purchase sacks of corn, Akouvi is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and make an income for her family to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of corn

loans.name: Dilrabokhon

texts.ru: На фотографии женщина из славного городка Исфара, которую зовут Дилрабохон. Исфара город вкусных персиков, орешек и сухофруктов. Вкус фруктов в этого городка несравнимо вкусно. Многие жители этого городка выбрали такие деятельности как садоводства и растениеводства. Но наша героиня Дилрабо выбрала иную деятельность. Она любит животных и выбрала животноводческий бизнес. На сегодняшний день работой на скотном дворе она занимается одна. Так как ее муж не найдя хорошую работу на Родине уехал на заработки в чужбину. Дилрабохон удается справляться одной и планирует расширить деятельность. Она обратилась за заемными средствами, чтобы купить пару голов телят и увеличить поголовья скотин. Дилрабо верит, что ее поддержат, и она осуществит свой план.
texts.en: Dilrabokhon is the name of the woman in this photograph, and she is from the renowned town of Isfara.  Isfara is a town of delicious peaches, dried fruits, and nuts.  The taste of the fruits in this town is incomparably delicious.  Many of the residents of the town work in businesses like horticulture and crop production.  But our heroine Dilrabokhon chose a different business.  She loves animals and started a business raising cattle, and now works alone in a cattle barn.  Because her husband could not find work in his native country, he went abroad for work.  Dilrabokhon has been successful on her own and plans to expand her business.  She is requesting borrowed funds in order to purchase a pair of calves and increase the size of her herd.  Dilrabokhon believes that you will help her, and that she will accomplish her plan.

loans.use: to purchase a pair of calves and expand her animal husbandry business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 44 years old and has seven children, three of whom are in school. For the past seven years she has run a sari-sari, or general store in the Philippines, where she sells a variety of items such as shampoo, coffee, milk, soap, canned goods, juices and other groceries.

Marilyn has applied for a 5000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy items to sell such as personal care products, canned goods, home care products and other groceries. She is working hard to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her sari-sari

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr: Dédé est une femme mariée qui vit avec son enfant à Baguida. Dédé est âgée de 36 ans et vend de la bouillie préparée à base de la farine de blé dans son quartier et des beignets pour l’accompagner. Dédé s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché pour disposer son stock. Pour commander un sac de maïs et quelques bols de farine de blé, Dédé demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et gagner plus de bénéfice pour venir en aide aux diverses charges de sa famille.
texts.en: Dédé is a married woman who lives with her child in Baguida. She is 36 years old and sells porridge made with [cornmeal] and served with beignets, in her district. She gets her supplies once a month at the market in order to have ingredients. To order a sack of corn and a few tubs of wheat flour, Dédé is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and earn more profit for helping to cover the diverse expenses of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn and a few tubs of wheat flour

loans.name: Mawoussi

texts.fr: Agée de 25 ans, Mawoussi est une femme mariée et mère d’un enfant. Mawoussi  habite à Baguida et vend des cures dent en se promenant dans les quartiers. Mawoussi  s’approvisionne trois fois dans le mois au marché. Mawoussi  demande ce crédit pour commander des troncs de cure dent pour vendre et augmenter son profit pour couvrir les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Mawoussi, aged 25, is a married woman and mother of one child. She lives in Baguida and sells teeth cleaners by going from district to district. She gets her supplies three time a month at the market. Mawoussi is asking for this loan to order teeth-cleaner sticks to sell and increase her profit for covering family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a few bundles of teeth-cleaner sticks

loans.name: Renalyn

texts.en:
Renalyn is a hardworking woman with four children who are in school. She earns a living by raising and selling pigs in the Philippines. She supplements this income with earnings from her sari-sari, or general store.

Renalyn is borrowing 12,000 PHP through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed for her pigs. She dreams that one day she will have saved enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed for her pigs

loans.name: Cathelyn

texts.en:
Cathelyn is 29 years old and married with two children. For the past three years she has raised and sold pigs to earn an income in the Philippines. She also earns additional money be selling fish.

Cathelyn is borrowing 6000 PHP through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Agée de 37 ans, Abla est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants. Abla habite à Baguida et vend des pates dentifrices et des cures dent en se promenant dans les quartiers. Abla s’approvisionne quatre fois dans le mois au marché. Abla souhaite répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients qui trouvent satisfaction dans son activité et  demande ce crédit pour commander des pates dentifrices et cure dent. Abla désire avoir une marge de bénéfice pour couvrir les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Abla, aged 37, is a married woman and mother of two. She lives in Baguida and sells toothpaste and teeth cleaners by going from district to district. She gets her supplies four times a month at the market. She would like to respond favorably to the expectations of her customers, who are happy with her business. Abla is asking for this loan to order toothpastes and teeth cleaners. She would like to have a profit margin to cover day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 4 units of teeth cleaners and 9 of toothpastes

loans.name: Ana Sonia

texts.es: Ana de 38 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia en compañía de sus dos hijos de 10, 17 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora y que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a sus hijos así como también brindado a su hogar todos los insumos básicos necesarios , ya cuenta con una pequeña tienda a la que llegan muchos clientes  que la conocen como una mujer muy amable y así es como Ana genera los ingresos económicos para su hogar. Ella  en su deseo de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia desea construir un cuarto, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, ladrillos, polines, láminas, puertas, ventanas, arena y ladrillo de piso para construir un cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en: Ana, who is 38, lives in her own home with her two children, who are 10 and 17 years old.  She is a hardworking woman and through a great deal of effort she has gotten her children ahead while also providing her household with all the necessary basics; she now has a small store that many customers visit because they know her to be a very kind woman and that's how she generates income for her household.  As part of her desire to improve her family's quality of life, she wants to build a room. which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in: cement, bricks, beams, sheet metal, windows, sand, and floor brick to build a bedroom.

loans.use: to invest in: cement, bricks, beams, sheet metal, doors, windows, sand, and floor brick to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Améyo

texts.fr: Améyo est une femme mariée âgée de 29 ans qui vit dans le quartier de Baguida avec ses trois enfants. Améyo participe activement à l’épanouissement de sa famille en vendant du riz préparé avec du haricot. Améyo a une bonne rentabilité et s’approvisionne  une fois par mois au marché pour mieux vendre. Améyo sollicite ce prêt pour acheter un sac de riz et un carton de spaghettis afin d’améliorer sa situation de vie grâce au bénéfice et aider son mari dans les besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en: Améyo is a married woman, 29 years old, living in the Baguida district with her three children. She actively helps her family to thrive by selling rice served with beans. Her profitability is good. She gets her supplies once a month at the market to better her sales. Améyo is requesting this loan to purchase a sack of rice and a box of spaghetti to improve her living conditions through her profits and to help out her husband in meeting day-to-day family needs.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of rice and a box of spaghetti

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 44 years old and married with five children. For the past two years she has raised and sold pigs to earn a living in the Philippines. She also sells food for extra income.

Edna is borrowing 7000 PHP through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Melody

texts.en:
Melody is 42 years old and is married with one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 Philippines Peso (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, soft drinks, chips, and other items.

Melody has borrowed and paid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, soft drinks, chips, and other items.

loans.name: Adakou

texts.fr: Agée de 26 ans et mariée, Adakou est une femme qui habite à Baguida avec ses quatre enfants. Restauratrice, Adakou vend du riz préparé au port pour satisfaire agréablement le goût de ses consommateurs. Cette activité lui permet d’avoir une bonne épargne pour investir dans la vie éducative de ses enfants. Adakou s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et demande ce prêt pour commander des sacs de riz. Grâce au bénéfice, Adakou souhaite améliorer ses prestations et bien s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en: Adakou, aged 26, is a married woman living in Baguida with her four children. A food caterer, she sells cooked rice at the port to satisfy the tastes of her consumers. This business enables her to have some money for investing in her children’s education. She gets her supplies once a month at the market and is asking for this loan to order some sacks of rice. Through her profits, she would like to improve her range of offerings and take good care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a few sacks of rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: hand cream, shampoo, lotions, deodorants, blouses, skirts, pants, shirts, etc. for her business

loans.name: Consolacion

texts.en:
Consolacion, 53, is married and has four children, one of whom is in school. For the past thirteen years she has operated a sari-sari, or small general store in the Philippines.

Consolacion has applied for a 20,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF in order to buy items to sell such as canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store. She is saving money to expand her shop.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her sari-sari

loans.name: Festus

texts.en:
Festus, 57, is married to Jenes and supports 6 children. 

He is running a retail business where he sells toiletries and other household products. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to add stock of retail household products like food and toiletries for resale.

He plans to use the gained profits to repay his loan and expand his business. 

His hope is to improve his family's living standard.

loans.use: to add stock for his retail business.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia, 57, is a woman with twelve children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Alicia has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines. Alicia requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed like bamboo sticks and other materials.

Alicia has been in this business for 37 years. In the future, Alicia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy needed materials for her nipa roofing business.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is a woman with eight children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Ana is 43 years old and five of her children are in school.

Ana has a business buying and selling crabs in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more crabs to sell.

Ana has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more crabs to sell

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicidad is 55 years old, married and has eight children, one of whom is in school. For the past three years she has raised and sold pigs to make a living in the Philippines.

Felicidad has successfully taken out and repaid five prior loans through Kiva's field partner NWTF. She is now applying for a 6500 PHP loan to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs. She works in the hope of providing a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Agée de 45 ans, Eya est une femme mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Eya vit à Agoè avec quatre enfants à sa charge et elle travaille vigoureusement pour améliorer ses conditions de vie. Pour arriver à ses fins, Eya vend des produits d’alimentations générales pour gagner assez de bénéfices et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Eya désire ce microcrédit pour commander des bidons d’huile, des cartons de tomates et un sac de riz afin d’aider ses enfants à avoir une bonne éducation scolaire grâce au bénéfice trouvé.
texts.en: Eya, aged 45, is a married woman and mother of four. She lives in Agoè with the four children she supports. She vigorously works to improve her living conditions. To reach her goals, Eya sells grocery items to earn a fair profit. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. She would like to have this micro-loan to put in an order for containers of oil, boxes of tomatoes, and a sack of rice, so as to help her children with a good education by way of the profits earned.

loans.use: to purchase 2 containers of oil, 2 boxes of tomatoes, and a sack of rice

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr: Divorcée et âgée de 28 ans, Marie est une femme qui habite à Agoè avec un enfant à sa charge. Marie vend des produits de beauté, des mèches et des tissages dans son atelier et gagne son revenu grâce à cette activité. Pour arriver à ses fins, Marie s’approvisionne trois fois par mois. Pour commander des mèches et des tissages,  Marie demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’un revenu afin de subvenir favorablement aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en: Marie, divorced and 28 years old, is a woman who lives in Agoè with a child she supports. She sells beauty products, hair extensions, and weaves in her shop. Thanks to this business, she earns an income. To reach her goals, she gets her supplies three time a month. To put in an order for hair extensions and weaves, Marie is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to have an income for meeting family needs favorably.

loans.use: to purchase 4 dozen hair extensions and 7 dozen weaves

loans.name: Ann Grace

texts.en:
Ann Grace, 22, is single with two children, one of whom is presently in school. 

Ann Grace is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Ann Grace has been in this business for 1 year now, and has borrowed 1 time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr: Kossiwa vit à Agoè et est âgée de 37 ans. Mariée, Kossiwa est  mère de deux enfants et très active pour favoriser leur éducation. Kossiwa vend des céréales  dans son quartier pour avoir son revenu pour leur subsistance. Kossiwa s’approvisionne cinq fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des sacs de maïs, Kossiwa demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et tirer sa rentabilité nécessaire.
texts.en: Kossiwa lives in Agoè and is 37 years old. A married woman, she is the mother of two and is very active for the sake of their education. She sells grains in her district to have an income for their subsistence. She gets her supplies five times a month at the market. To order sacks of corn, Kossiwa is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to have the necessary profitability.

loans.use: to  purchase 6 sacks of corn

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.fr: Charlotte est une femme mariée âgée de 37 ans et habite dans le quartier de Tokoin. Charlotte travaille courageusement pour assurer les charges quotidiennes de ses quatre enfants. Pour répondre à ce besoin, Charlotte vend des produits d’alimentation au marché et s’approvisionne trois fois par mois pour avoir le revenu nécessaire. Charlotte désire ce crédit pour commander des sacs d’oignons et des bidons d’huile qui lui permettront de maximiser son profit et soutenir l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Charlotte is a married woman, 37 years old, living in the Tokoin district. She works bravely to ensure the day-to-day expenses of her children are met. To respond to this need, she sells grocery items at the market. She gets her supplies three times a month to have the necessary income. Charlotte would like to have this loan to put in an order for sacks of onions and containers of oil that will enable her to maximize her profit and support her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase 2 containers of oil and a sack of onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in milk, chocolate, coffee, soft drinks, cups and napkins to improve her sales.

loans.name: Sougrinooma Group

texts.fr: Rosalie, membre représentatif est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Elle fait des gâteaux pour vendre depuis 7 ans. Elle a besoin du crédit pour acheter de la farine, de l'huile, du sucre et les autres ingrédients nécessaire pour faire des gâteaux pour vendre. Elle fait cuire ses gâteaux avec le gaz butane donc, une partie de son argent servira à le chargé. après ses ventes, son bénéfice lui permettra de s'occuper de sa famille et aussi de continuer son activité.
texts.en: Rosalie, a representative member, is a married mother of four. She has been making cakes to sell for seven years. She has need of a loan to purchase some flour, oil, sugar, and the other ingredients necessary for making cakes to sell. She bakes the cakes with butane, so part of her money will be used to cover that expense. After her sales, Rosalie’s profit will enable her to take care of her family and also to continue her business.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, oil, and other ingredients for making cakes

loans.name: Djigbodi

texts.fr: Agée de 39 ans, Djigbodi est une femme mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Djigbodi vit à Tokoin pour exercer son activité de vente d’articles de mercerie. Ce commerce lui permet de venir en aide aux besoins de sa famille et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire. Djigbodi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des rouleaux de doublure et des rubans, Djigbodi demande ce prêt pour acheter ses articles et augmenter son bénéfice pour aider ses enfants à s’épanouir.
texts.en: Djigbodi, aged 39,  is a married woman and mother of four. She lives in Tokoin to operate her business selling sewing supplies. This commerce enables her to help meet her family’s needs and to make a good profit margin. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. To order rolls of lining material and some ribbons, Djigbodi is asking for this loan to help her children to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase 6 rolls of lining material and 6 rolls of ribbons

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom at their home to improve access to sanitation and water

loans.name: Ukurikwose Group

texts.fr:
Jacqueline  fait partie du groupe  Ukurikwose et  habite à Gitega. Elle a 45 ans et est mariée à Joseph  un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont  6  enfants  âgés de 2 à 19 ans, dont 5  étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de bière de banane depuis  30 ans. 

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de banane à transformer en bière de banane  à vendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait  acheter une parcelle et n terrain cultivable et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is part of the group Ukurikwose and lives in Gitega. She is 45 years old and married to Joseph, a farmer. Together they have six children, from 2 to 19 years old, of whom five are students. 

Jacqueline has been doing commerce in banana beer for five years. She is on her 3rd loan at Turame. With the KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and purchase a large amount of bananas to process into beer to sell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to buy a parcel of land and some arable land and to see her children educated.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of bananas to process into beer to sell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in more merchandise that she currently sells such as bags, wallets, shoes, blouses, shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stock of sodas for sale to clients to meet their demands and those of her family.

loans.name: Rosalyn

texts.en:
Rosalyn is 33 years old and married with three children.

Rosalyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like home care products and other groceries.

Rosalyn has borrowed and paid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Rosalyn aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is now borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She supplements this income with earnings from her tricycle passenger service.

Emelita dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Zoraida

texts.en:
Zoraida is 42 years old with seven children. With seven children in school, Zoraida works very hard to provide for them.

Zoraida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like liquor, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

Zoraida has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft drinks, biscuits, junk foods, soap and other groceries. 

In the future, Zoraida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like liquor, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Blanca

texts.en:
Blanca is 58 years old and married with three children.

Blanca works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Blanca has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Blanca aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease land to expand her farming activity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stock of tomatoes and vegetables for selling to clients to meet their demands and those of her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm tools and certified seeds for planting for high production and supply for more income gain.

loans.name: Sulanita

texts.en:
Sulanita is 52 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Sulanita is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Sulanita has been farming vegetables for seven years and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, oil, vegetables, and gas for meat pies, and fabric for tailoring

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 63 years old and married. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lolita has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Lolita requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional stock of rice to sell.

Lolita has been in this business for three years. In the future, Lolita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of rice to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy juice, vegetables, eggs, bread, staple grains and other things so she can expand her business

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 54 años de edad vive con su esposa con sus dos hijos un varón de 16 años de edad y su hija de 10 años de edad su vivienda es propia, en su comunidad se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy emprendedor por sacar adelante a su familia y que a sus hijos no les falte lo necesario. Él se dedica a la venta de granos básicos los cuales tienen una gran demanda, por lo que él está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: frijoles, maíz, arroz y azúcar y vender en cantidades más grandes y así mejorar sus ingresos y llevar lo necesario a su hogar y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: 54-year-old Juan lives with his wife and two children: a 16-year-old boy and a 10-year-old girl. He has his own house. He is known in the community as a very enterprising man who supports his family and makes sure his children have everything they need. He makes a living by selling staple grains, which are in great demand. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in beans, maize, rice, and sugar. He will sell them in larger quantities, thereby increasing his earnings so he can support his household and give his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beans, maize, rice, and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, t-shirts, underwear, skirts, shirts, and other items of clothing so she can increase her sales and improve her profits

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is 37 years old and married. She supports 2 children. 

Eunice has been a small-scale farmer for several years, which has been profitable. 

She has applied for her first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy certified seeds and fertilizers to improve her productivity. 

She plans to use the profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy certified seeds and fertilizers to improve her productivity.

loans.name: Débora Roxana

texts.es:
Débora es una muchacha de 22 años de edad, es soltera tiene una linda familia de dos hijos ellos viven en una comunidad del Quiché.
Débora con el afán de generar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a sus hijos se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica, ella tiene un año de realizar esta labor. Débora desde hace algún tiempo ha empezado la construcción de su casa pero ahora ya no cuenta con dinero suficiente para poder finalizar la construcción es por ello que solicita un préstamo para poder comprar cemento, cal  y arena y terminar la construcción lo más pronto posible.
Débora sueña con poder terminar la construcción de su casa antes de terminar el año para que ella y sus hijos cuenten con un lugar más adecuado para compartir.
texts.en:
Débora is a 22-year-old young woman. She is single. She has two lovely children and they all live in a community in Quiché.

Débora makes traditional clothing in order to generate income and support her children. She has been doing this for one year. Débora began building her house a while ago, but now she does not have enough money to finish building it. For this reason, she is requesting a loan so she can buy cement, lime, and sand to finish building her house as soon as possible.

Débora dreams of being able to finish building her house before the end of the year so that she and her children have a more suitable place to live.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Zenaida works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell spice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more spices to sell for her buy-and-sell spice business.

Zenaida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more spices to sell

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 28 years old. She is married to Julius and supports 4 children. 

She has been selling bananas for the last 2 years, and the business earns her KES 9,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase additional stock of fresh, ripe bananas, which are the preferred fruit of most of her clients.

She plans to use the profits gained to repay the loan and expand her business.
 
She hopes to be financially stable and to start a grocery shop.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of fresh, ripe bananas, which are the preferred fruit of most of her clients

loans.name: Felisters

texts.en:
Felisters is 32 years old and married to Joseph, and she supports a family of 2 children. 

She has been selling clothing supplies in the market for the last 5 years, earning KES 5,000 per month. She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy additional pairs of second-hand shoes in order to gain more income.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and to start a retail shop. 

Felisters' future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy additional pairs of second-hand shoes

loans.name: Mary Rose

texts.en:
Mary Rose is a 28-year-old, married woman with two children, both of whom are sent to school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Mary Rose has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks of rice to sell. She has been in this business for two years. 

In the future, Mary Rose would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is a 39-year-old, married woman with three children, who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Arlene has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional clothing stock for her clothing sales business

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Liza works hard to support her family.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing.  Liza is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to  buy sacks of rice to sell.

Liza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Kristiani

texts.en:
Hello lenders! This is Kristiani, one of Ruma’s agents. Kristiani lives in Yogyakarta, a city located about one hour by airplane from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Happily married and the mother of one cute child, Kristiani owns and manages a small stall that sells daily consumer products. She joined Ruma in 2014, and she feels excited to learn more about mobile technology from Ruma’s mobile application. Her community sees Kristiani as a trusted and kind mobile provider. 

By supporting this loan you will be providing extra working capital for Kristiani's shop. This will allow her to become an agent for Ruma’s layaway product called 'Mapan,' designed for lower income communities. Mapan enables customers to save up, little by little, by depositing change at agents like Kristiani and as their balance grows, it allows customers to make major asset purchases like housewares, appliances, and school supplies for their children. 

As a Mapan agent, Kristiani is responsible for processing deposits from customers into their Mapan accounts as well as receiving orders from customers who want to buy products listed in Ruma's Mapan catalog. When a customer orders, Kristiani will submit the order via SMS and, within 5-10 days, the product will be delivered to the customer. With Mapan, Kristiani believes that her community will be able to have access to higher quality products with lower prices. 

In the photo, Kristiani is shown holding Mapan's poster. She is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to help community members purchasing products through Ruma's e-commerce for lower communities called Mapan.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Maricel works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store.  Maricel is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Maricel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Wilter

texts.en:
Wilter, aged 23 years old, is married to Jailus and supports one child. 

She is operating a retail business where she sells home appliances and products. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to add stock of tomatoes and homemade vegetable oil for sale.

She plans to use the gained profit to repay the loan and educate her child. 

Her hopes are to be financially stable and expand her business.

loans.use: to add stock of tomatoes and homemade vegetable oil for sale.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina una madre de familia trabajadora y muy dedicada a sus dos hijos, ella tiene 30 años de edad y vive junto a su familia en una comunidad del departamento de Sololá.
Cristina para que su familia tenga todo lo necesario se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa casual este negocio lo tiene ella apenas hace un año, pero con la buena administración que Cristina tiene con su tienda el negocio marcha muy bien, Cristina con el afán de seguir prosperando con su negocio solicita un préstamo para poder comprar más productos, como suéteres, blusas pantalones entre otros.
Cristina tiene el anhelo de hacer crecer su negocio para que sus ingresos mejoren para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina is a mother from a hard-working family and is very dedicated to her two children. She is 30 years old and lives with her family in a community in the Sololá area. 

In order to ensure that her family has what it needs, Cristina works in the purchase and sale of casual clothing. She has only had this business for a year, but with the great management that Cristina uses in her store, business is going well. Cristina hopes to continue with her success and is requesting a loan to be able to buy more products, such as sweaters, blouses, pants, etc. 

Cristina hopes to make her business grow and improve her income for her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy and sell casual clothing

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela es una mujer digna de admirarse pues gracias a su esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a su familia, ella cuenta que antes no tenía las posibilidades para poder cantar con sus materiales para preparar los alimentos para luego venderlos pero ahora gracias al crédito ella pudo comprar su estufa industrial por lo que ya no padece de esta necesidad, y ahora prepara  los alimentos con rapidez, pero estela es una mujer con muchas ganas de seguir superándose por tal razón solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar otra estufa industrial pues con la que cuenta ya no le es suficiente para preparar  los alimentos.
Estela tiene el anhelo de comprar un terreno y construir una casa mucho más amplia para que sus hijos vivan mejor.
texts.en:
Estela a woman worthy of admiration. Thanks to her efforts, she has been able to provide for her family. She tells us that before, there was no way to get the materials to make the food that she would later sell. Thanks to the previous loan, she was able to buy an industrial stove so that now she doesn't have to worry about this vital need. 

Now she can make the food quickly, but Estela is determined to keep improving, which is why she is requesting a new loan to be able to buy another industrial stove. The one that she has isn't enough to prepare all the food. 

Estela hopes to buy a plot of land and build a bigger house so that her children can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy an industrial stove

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase necklaces, earrings and rings

loans.name: Nouna Kadi Group

texts.fr: Awa remercie kiva ainsi que tous les prêteurs pour le soutien. Le prêt a beaucoup aidé Awa car elle a pu payer des oignons pour vendre. Elle a eu un bénéfice qui lui a permis de payer la scolarité de ses enfants, rénover la maison et aussi contribuer aux dépenses de la maison. Le groupe de Awa est à son 11ème contrat de prêt et a besoin d'un nouveau crédit pour continuer les activités de commerce. Awa veut acheter 30 sacs de d'oignon à 10 000 francs le sac soit 300 000 francs. Après ses ventes, elle aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra de faire les dépenses de la maison et aussi de faire l'épargne car elle aimerait acheter une parcelle plutard.
texts.en: Awa would like to thank Kiva as well as all the lenders for their support. This loan has greatly helped Awa, as she was able to purchase onions and resell them. She earned enough profit to allow her to pay for her children's school fees, renovate her home and also contribute to household costs. This will be the 11th loan for Awa's group. They need this new loan in order to continue their retail businesses. Awa wants to purchase 30 sacks of onions at 10,000 francs per sack, costing 300,000 francs in total. After selling her goods, she'll have enough profits to see to her household's expenses and also start some savings, as she would like to purchase a plot of land at a later date.

loans.use: to purchase 30 sacks of onions at 10,000 francs per sack, costing 300,000 francs in total, which will be resold

loans.name: Hue

texts.en: Mrs. Hue is a hardworking woman who is 48 years old. Currently her family is raising 15 pigs. Her family’s income is mainly from husbandry, cultivation and small business. This loan will help her to construct biogas digesters, which can help her to save money by using biogas for cooking and contribute to protecting the environment.

loans.use: To construct biogas digesters to save money by using biogas and to protect environment

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Lucia es una mujer muy trabajadora que lucha día con día para darle  a sus cuatro hijos una mejor calidad de vida sus hijos tiene las edades entre 20 y 10 años, Lucía para que no les haga falta nada a sus primogénitos se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica desde hace 10 años, Lucia con el afán de mejorar sus ingresos a tomado la decisión de solicitar un  préstamo para poder comprar sus materiales como hilos de diferentes colores y marcas para seguir elaborando los mejores trajes típicos de su región.
El gran sueño de Lucía es ser reconocida nacionalmente como artesana para que sus ingresos mejoren y su calidad de vida también.
texts.en:
Lucia is a very hard-working woman who strives every day to give her four children a better quality of life. Her children are aged between 10 and 20 years old. For 10 years Lucia has made a living making traditional clothing so that her oldest children do not go without.

With the desire to improve her income, Lucia has taken the decision to ask for a loan to buy her materials such as different colours and brands of threads in order to continue producing the best typical costumes of her region.

Lucia's biggest dream is to be nationally recognised as an artisan so that her income improves as well as her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy thread for making traditional clothing.

loans.name: Fanjona

texts.fr:
Fanjona est une mère de famille de 46 ans. Elle est mariée et son mari est magasinier salarié au sein d'une société privée. Ils ont deux enfants dont le premier est déjà marié mais le second qui n'a que 11 ans, fréquente encore l'école.
Fanjona est artisane, elle coude des sacs, et trousses en tissus et puis les décors avec des coquillages. Elle fabrique aussi des colliers et des bracelets avec des coquillages et des noyaux de fruits séchés. Elle livre ses œuvres chez des marchands des arts malagasy. Son objectif est d'acquérir un  petit pavillon qui va lui servir de point de vente.
texts.en: Fanjona is a 46-year-old married mother. Her husband is a salaried storekeeper for a private company. They have had two children together, the first of whom is already married, while the second is only 11 years old and is still going to school. Fanjona is an artisan. She makes bags and cases out of fabric then decorates them with shells. She also makes necklaces and bracelets out of shells and the pits of dried fruits. She sells her creations to Malagasy art merchants. Her goal is to purchase a small pavilion which she'll use as a boutique to sell her wares.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, sewing thread, zips and shells

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 25 años de edad, es soltera vive junto a sus padres en una comunidad del departamento de Sololá.
Juan para poder obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa se dedica a la agricultura desde hace cinco años, gracias a esta labor él ha sacado adelante a su familia. Juan en estos días ya preparo la tierra para empezar a cultivar en esta época de café pero una de las dificultades que él tiene es que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder comparar sus almácigos y fertilizantes por tal razón solicita un préstamo para poder realizar la siembra a tiempo.
Juan sueña con poder contar con el crédito para mejorar sus ingresos y construir su casa para la comodidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is a young 25-year-old man. He is single and lives with his parents in a community in the department of Sololá. In order to have an income and support his parents with the household expenses, Juan has worked in agriculture for 5 years. Thanks to this work he has provided for his family.

At the present time Juan has already prepared the land to start growing during this coffee season but one of the difficulties he has is that he does not have enough capital to be able to buy his coffee seedlings and fertilizer. This is the reason why he is asking for a loan so he can carry out the planting in time.

Juan hopes to be able to get the loan in order to improve his income and build his house for his family's comfort.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy different articles of clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons and other items.
